120b4(mdo sde): zhig rab tu gnas nas yang dag par 'dzin par byed na/ gang zag de ni skal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal brgya stong gi bar du yang dag pa'i smon lam bskyed pa
120b5(mdo sde): mthar thug pa med cing ral gri dang / dbyig pa dang dug dang / nu dang / me dang / gcan zan ma rungs pa rnams de'i lus la gnod pa byed mi nus par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir
120b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ sha ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum dang / da ltar bzhags pa'i
120b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas so// sha ri'i bu gang la la zhig gis grangs med pa bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis
120b8(mdo sde): yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul nas/ bskal bgrangs med pa'i bar dun bza' dang / gal zas mchog kyis mchod pa pas/ gang la la
121a1(mdo sde): zhig gis gzungs 'di las tha na tshigacig tsam yang dag par bzung ba las byung ba'i bsod nams rnams gang yin pa de ni ches rab tu
121a2(mdo sde): mang po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs shin du zab pa'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir
121a3(mdo sde): ro// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur pas thams cad kyis yongs
121a4(mdo sde): su 'dzin par mos par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyis le'u ste bcu gsum
121a5(mdo sde): ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu
121a6(mdo sde): rin po che zhes bya ba'i gzungs gnod pa thams cad ring du spong ba/ 'brug dang klog ma rungs pa thams cad 'gag cing 'jil bar byed pa yod de/ de ni 'das pa'i de bzhin
121a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs pa yin pas/ ngas kyang deng mdo sde 'di'i lha dang mi rnams la phan dang / 'jig
121a8(mdo sde): shin la thugs rtse ba dang / thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas/ bde bathob par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor mang po khyed la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas/
121b1(mdo sde): khor mang po dang tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba thos pa dang / so so nas sems rtse gcig tu bcom ldan gyi zham pa la bsdus
121b2(mdo sde): nas/ rig sngags mnyan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag legs par nyon cig 'di nas shar phyogs na klog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po a ta
121b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs na klog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po sha ta ru zhes bya ba dang / nub phyogs na klog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po tsu te kang zhes bya ba dang / bang phyog na klog 'od snang
121b4(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po su ta ma ni zhes bya ba yod de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la lo zhig gis/ klog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming thos shing phyogs shes par gyur na/ gang
121b5(mdo sde): zag de 'jigs shing skrag pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing blo bur gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te gang du gnas der phyogs bzhi'i
121b6(mdo sde): klog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming yi ger bris par gyur na/ gang du gnas pa'i gnas de dag tu 'brug dang / klog gi 'jigs pa med cing gdon bgegs dang gnod pa'i sgrib
121b7(mdo sde): pa med par 'gyur/ dus ma yin pa'i glo bur du 'chi ba thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA
121b8(mdo sde): ni mi ni mi ni mi/ ni mi spen te/ staM lo kya/ lo kya ni sha ri sho la ba ni/ ha rak+Sha ha ra k+Sha// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gnas 'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal
122a1(mdo sde): gyi 'tshe ba dang 'brug dang / klog dang / thog 'bab pa dang / blo bur du 'chi ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas byang chub
122a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i nang nas 'dug pa'i stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas gus pas thal
122a3(mdo sde): mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag kyang lha dang mi rnams la sman par bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la btse ba dang / tham
122a4(mdo sde): cad yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / mthu chen po'i stobs dang ldan zhing smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par par bgyi ba'i ched du/ bcom
122a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs gang lags pa mdo tsam zhig bstan par bgyi'o// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa// / tad+ya thA/
122a6(mdo sde): g+ha te bi ba te/ ni ga te/ pa ri ste g+hi/ pa ri de mi shri/ shud d+he mo ga te/ b+hi ma le/ ba ri b+ha swa ra re/ a na tsa ri/ pan tsa ri/ shud d+he ban tsa ra/ b+ha si ni ha re/ ka tsa ra ka ba pI ri
122a7(mdo sde): ping ga la a khi d+ha da mu Shi rak+Sha rak+Sha// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gnas 'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'chi ba nas blo bur du 'chi ba'i
122a8(mdo sde): bar thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ bdag gi sdig pa'i dngos po ngan pa thams cad mi mthong zhing rtag par byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
122b1(mdo sde): phyug gi thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis dgrongs shing yongs su bsrung bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po stan
122b2(mdo sde): las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang deng lha dang mi rnams la sman pa cher bgyi ba
122b3(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi ba'i ched du mi
122b4(mdo sde): pham pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par bgyi'o// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni mu ni le/ ma ti ma ti mu ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ha ha ha ma b+ha yi/ na
122b5(mdo sde): sti ti pa ba/ badz+ra pa ni a ha ma tsi ri tsa swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs sngags 'di ni mi pa ma pa bsrungs pa zhes bgyis te/ skyes pa 'am bud med gang la la zhig
122b6(mdo sde): sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par bzung ste/ yi ge 'bri 'am klog pa dang 'don pa dang mi rgyud cing rjes dran par bgyid na/ bdag gdugs mtshan du de la yongs su
122b7(mdo sde): bsrung bar bgyid pas 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad nas blo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur legs so// de nas mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi
122b8(mdo sde): khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
123a1(mdo sde): la yang shin du gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs lha dang mi rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba thams
123a2(mdo sde): cad yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pa/ gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de bshad
123a3(mdo sde): par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ti li mi li di li swA hA/ pra ha ma mi bu re bra ha ma ma ni/ pra ha ma ma garbe buSh+pa sing sing d+ha re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs sngag
123a4(mdo sde): 'di ni tshangs pa'i chad pas bcad pa zhes bgyi ste/ gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa dag la yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang / sdig pa'i las
123a5(mdo sde): rnams thag ring du spong zhing blo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad kyang yongs su spong bar bgyid do// de nas brgya byin lnga'i dbang pos stan las langs te/ gus
123a6(mdo sde): pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la yang badz+ra sha~M zhes bya ba'i gzungs rig sngags chen mo//
123a7(mdo sde): 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu sel ba/ blo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong ba/ sdug bsngal las grangs nas
123a8(mdo sde): bde ba rtsol ba/ lha dang mi rnams la sman par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs de bshad par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ b+hi ni b+he ra ni/ ban dam dan ti/ ma ni ne di di zhi ku
123b1(mdo sde): le gan d+ha ri/ tsan d+ha ri/ ma taM gi/ puka si/ sa ra b+ha ra b+he/ ni ha ma ma ti ta ma ma/ ma ho na ta ra ni/ ma ho ra ni/ d+ha ra ni ke/ tsakra b+ha kye/ sha ba re sha ba re swA hA/ de nas
123b2(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po rnam thos dang / lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung dang / lha'i rgyal phags skyes po dang / lha'i rgyal po mig mi bzang cig car bstan las langs te/
123b3(mdo sde): gus pas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dag la yang sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya
123b4(mdo sde): ba'i gzungs sdug bsngal gyi nyon mongs pa las rtag par yongs su skyabs nas/ bde ba thob par bgyid cing tshe 'phel bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi sdug bsngal
123b5(mdo sde): ma mchis par bgyid pa/ blo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong bar bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su pu
123b6(mdo sde): Sh+pe/ dus pa pa ri ha ra/ ar+ya po ri sha sid d+hi/ shan ti nir mog ti/ maM ga le sU tu te sid d+ha bid ti swAhA// de nas yang klu'i rgyal po mang po 'di sta ste/ klu'i rgyal
123b7(mdo sde): bo ma na si dang / klu'i rgyal po klog 'od dang / klu'i rgyalo po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po klog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po gya nom 'od la sogs pa stan las langs
123b8(mdo sde): te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che
124a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i gzungs klog ma rungs pa 'gag par bgyid pa/ 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams rab tu sel ba/ lha dang mi rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs
124a2(mdo sde): pa/ 'jig rten la snying rtse ba/ thams cad yongs su skyob pa/ gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa/ blo bur du mchi ba'i bar
124a3(mdo sde): thams cad thag ring du spong ba dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ byad sdems dang / sngags dang bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su sel bar
124a4(mdo sde): bgyid pa mchis te/ bdag cag gzungs sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das la 'bul na/ thugs rjes thugs rtse bar dgongs te/ bdag cag klu'i 'gro ba 'di dag dang
124a5(mdo sde): gtan du bral nas ser sna'i 'dud pa spang ba'i slad du bzhis su gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ser sna'i 'dud pa 'di ni dbang gis 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mang po myong bar
124a6(mdo sde): 'gyur bas/ bdag ser sna'i 'dod pa'i sa bon yongs su gcod par 'tshal lags so// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ a tsa lai a ma le/ a mri ti ak+Sha
124a7(mdo sde): ye/ a be ye/ pu ne pu ne ba ri le/ b+had d+he sarba ba bA pa ri sa ma ye swA hA/ a la le ban du ban du so ba ri ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
124a8(mdo sde): gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di g.yar kha nas 'don par bgyid dam/ yi ge bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas 'chang zhing 'dzin par bgyid dam/ klog cing 'don par
124b1(mdo sde): bgyid dam gus pas mchod par bgyid na 'brug dang klog dang / thog mi bab cig skrag pa dang 'jigs pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa dang / mya ngan dang nad
124b2(mdo sde): dang blo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur/ dug dang byed sdems dang mi la gnod pa byed pa'i stag dang / seng ge dang / sbrang gi dang / sbrul
124b3(mdo sde): bdug pa'i rnam pa dang / sbrang ma dang sbyar bu chu rings la la sogs pa dang / gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang
124b4(mdo sde): po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ legs so leg so// gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad mthu chen po dang ldan pas/ sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/
124b5(mdo sde): sems can la bsam pa'i dngos po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/ rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed do// sems rtse gcig tu ma byas pa ni ma gtogs te/ khyed
124b6(mdo sde): cag the tshom ma za cig/ de nas 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba thos pa dang / rab tu dga' bas mngon par yid ches par
124b7(mdo sde): gyur nas dga' bas yang dag par gzung bar gyur to// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu
124b8(mdo sde): rin po che'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas lha mo spobs pa chen po 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
125a1(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba'i mkhan po gang la la zhig/ gser 'od dam
125a2(mdo sde): pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par snyan par bgyid na/ bdag cag gis shes rab 'phel bar bgyis nas brgyan dang ldan pa'i tshig gis spobs
125a3(mdo sde): ba phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// gal te chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mdo sde 'di las tshig 'bru dang yi ge dang / tshig gi don rgyud pa zhig mchis na/ yang thams cad rjes
125a4(mdo sde): su dran zhing legs par khong du chud par bgyid nas/ gzungs kyi kun 'dzin thogs pa ma mchis par bgyid do// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal
125a5(mdo sde): po 'di sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtse ba bskyed nas yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgya cher spel nas/
125a6(mdo sde): myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can tshad mchis pa snyed mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dbang dbang gis/ thams cad shin du myur pa'i spobs pa dang / bas
125a7(mdo sde): pa mchis pa'i shes rab chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas/ bstan bcos sna tshogs dang / sgyu stsal rnams la rab tu mkhas pa dang / 'khor ba las myur du ngas
125a8(mdo sde): par byung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par bgyid do// tshe 'di nyid la yang che 'phel zhing mtsho ba'i yo byad rnas
125b1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdo sde 'dzin pa'i chos kyi mkhan po de dag dang / sems can gzhan gang mdo sde 'di nyen par
125b2(mdo sde): mos de dag gi ched du sman la sngags kyi btab nas/ khrus bgyi ba'i cho ga gzhad par 'tshal te/ de dag la gza' ma rungs pa lhas ngan smon pa ci mchis pa dang /
125b3(mdo sde): dang po gcas pa'i gza' skar dang / phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal dang zab pa dang rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang rmi lam ngan pa dang /
125b4(mdo sde): gdon bgegs dang byang sdems dang / dug dang ngan du bgyis pa dang / sngags dang ro langs dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi sgrib dang /
125b5(mdo sde): bgegs bgyid pa thams cad yongs su bsal nas rab tu zhi bar bgyid pas/ blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis khrus kyi cho ga 'di ltar bgyid te/ des sman gyi ro dang
125b6(mdo sde): ldan pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta ste/ shu dag g+hi l+le dang ni pri ka spos// bla rtsi ba bla dag dang shi ri sha// en tra ha sta sha ma ka sha mi// thang chu dang ni shing tsha
125b7(mdo sde): kla sgad dang // a ka ru dang tsan dan ta kar// sa la ki dang gur gum ha las// na tra smig cud su kyi ma me le// thang shing pa tra dang ni on sha la/ 2sa la ke dang
125b8(mdo sde): pra ba gu gul dang // yungs dkar go rnyod nag ge sa ra// sa tsa ra sa ru rta cha mnyam bgyis skar ma rgyal la cig tu btags nas ni// spos kyi phye ma de dgarab
126a1(mdo sde): blangs nas// sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad gdab par bgyi// sngags 'di lta ste// tad+ya thA/ su krid tri/ krid twe kye/ ka ma da le/ dz+nya no g+ha rang
126a2(mdo sde): d+he/ u ka ra/ in tra sha ri ni/ la ka ran ta/ ba sha tsi le ba b+had d+he/ ka si ke na/ ku du ku du/ kha ka be r+ye/ ka pi le ka bi le/ ka mi lam ti/ shi la ma ti/ san d+he du ra ma tre/
126a3(mdo sde): pa pang ku b+han dzi le/ shi ri shi le sad d+h+ya sh+tsi ti swA hA// / gal te tshig bzhin khrus ni bgyid 'tshal na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi khru brgyad pa bgyis nas// rab tu dben
126a4(mdo sde): zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu// don gang bsgrub pa sems la dran par bgyis// bgrang lcibs dkyil 'khor byugs nas ni// steng du me tog kun du bkram par bgyi/
126a5(mdo sde): gser dngul snod ni shin tu gtsang ma dag/ ro mchog 'o ma sbrang rtsis bgang bar bgyi/ dkyil 'khor de'i sgo bzhi dag du yang // skyes bu bzhi bzhi chos bzhin
126a6(mdo sde): bsrung du 'tshal// bzhin nu bzhi bzhi lus ni rab brgyan nas// so so gra rer chab kyi bum pa thogs// der ni rtag par gu gul sems na ni// dbyangs
126a7(mdo sde): lnga'i rol mo rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi// dkyil 'khor de'i ngos bzhi dag tu yang // ba dan gdugs dang lnga ldi mdzes par bgyi// dkyil 'khor nang du me long
126a8(mdo sde): gsal ba dang // ral gri rnon po mda' bzhi bzhags par bgyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhod khung che btsal nas// 'dzegs pa'i shing le ba de'i steng du bzhag
126b1(mdo sde): snga ma'i phyi ma chab dang sbyar nas ni/ dkyil 'khor de'i nang du bzhag par bgyi/ de ltar bkram zhing rnam par bzhag nas ni/ de nas sngags zlas dkyil 'khor mtshams bcad
126b2(mdo sde): bgyi// mtshams bcad pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste// tad+ya thA/ a na ra ke na ya ri// hi le mi le/ khi le khi bi le swA hA/ de ltar mtshams ni rab bcad de// dkyil 'khor nad
126b3(mdo sde): du zhugs nas ni/ nyi shu rtsa gcig chab sngags te/ phyogs bzhi dag tu gtor bar bgyi// de nas spos chab dag la ni// b+had te swA hA/ khrus bgyis pa'i chab dang /
126b4(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchod pa bgyis pa'i bza' ba dang / gtung ba ci mchis pa gtsang po dang / rdzing gi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing / gzhan ni bsdu bar bgyi'o//
126b5(mdo sde): de ltar khrus bgyis lags nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dkyil 'khor nas phyir phyung nas khang pa gtsang mi'i nang du zhugs te/ sngags mkhan gyis de dag
126b6(mdo sde): yi dam rgya chen po blong du btsal nas/ sdig pa sna tshogs gtan du bcad nas/ dge ba sna tshogs rnam par bcad cing // sems can rnams la snying rje chen
126b7(mdo sde): po bskyed par bgyi ste/ rgyu dang rkyen des na yid bzhin gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ched ma mchis pa snyed thob par 'gyur lags so// yang tshigs su
126b8(mdo sde): bcad de gsol po// sems can gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal nyan// sman spyad sna tshogs gsos kyang ma sos pa/ khrus kyi cho ga 'di bzhin khrus bgyis te/
127a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang mdo sde 'di ni klog nyon nas// gdugs mtshan rtag par sems ni mig yeng ba// rtse gcig gus pas dang sems bskyed
127a2(mdo sde): bgyis nas// nad kyi sdug bsngal bas ba zhi bar 'gyur// dbul pongs thar nas nor dang ldan par 'gyur// phyogs bzhi'i gza' skar nyi zla'i lha// mthu yis rab
127a3(mdo sde): bsrungs che ni ring bar 'gyur// bkra shis rab bde bsod nams rab tu 'phel// ltas ngan gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu sel// de'i 'og tu lus bsrungs pa'i
127a4(mdo sde): sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig zla bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste// tad+ya thA/ sa me bi ma me swAhA/ sa ba te big te swA hA/ bi ga tsa bAd de swA hA/ sa gar saM b+hud d+ha ya
127a5(mdo sde): swA hA/ kan d+ha ma ta ya swA hA/ ni la kan tha ya swA hA/ a ba tsi ta bar+ya swA hA/ hi ma b+han d+ha saM bud d+h+ye swA hA/ a ni mi la pa tra ya swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga bad to// b+ha haM ma sa swA hA/ na
127a6(mdo sde): mo swa ra swa the ma hA de be ye swA hA/ sid d+han tu man tra pa da swA hA/ d+ha ra to bi tsing pra ha ma ma no ra bi to swA hA// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos khrus kyi cho ga dang /
127a7(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bshad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge
127a8(mdo sde): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yid gar bris nas spel ba dang /
127b1(mdo sde): ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod par byed na/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ 'brog dgon pa'am/ ri 'am nags tshal lam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'i gnas gang
127b2(mdo sde): yang rung ba dag tu gnas kyang rung ste/ bdag de'i ched du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig lha'i 'khor mo bgyis nas de'i thad du mchis te/ yongs su skyob pa dang bsrung
127b3(mdo sde): ba bgyis na nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / skar mda' lhung ba dang / ltas ngan dang rims nad dang / 'tha' cing rtsod pa rnams sel bar gyid/ rgyal po'i khrims kyi gzung
127b4(mdo sde): ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa thams cad gnod pa byed pa dang / byad sdems thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyis nas/ mdo sde 'dzin pa'i gang
127b5(mdo sde): zag dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor dang / nyan pa'i 'khor rnams myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las bzlas nas byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur bar phan 'dogs
127b6(mdo sde): par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang / lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/ lha me khyod kyis sems can tshad
127b7(mdo sde): med cing mtha' med pa dag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i chad du rig sngags de dag dang / spos chus khrus bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu
127b8(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab dang ldan pa yang dag par bshad pa legs so leg so// zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di
128a1(mdo sde): bsrungs nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing rtag par rgya cher gnas par 'gyur bar byos shig/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos bcom ldan
128a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ rang gi bstan la 'dug par gyur to// de nas bram ze ko'u 'di n+ya chos kyi slob dpon gyis lung bstan pa/ bcon ldan 'das
128a3(mdo sde): kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis mthus/ 'khor mang po'i mdun du lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod pa/ shes bsal rab dpa' spobs pa'i lha mo khyod/
128a4(mdo sde): lha mi'i chod pa dag gis mchod par 'os// grags pas 'jig rten kun du rgyas pa na// sems can thams cad re ba rdzogs par byed/ ri rtse thon po dag gi gnas
128a5(mdo sde): mchog tu/ rtsa bslas khyim byas de na rab tu gnas/ rgyun du rtsa 'jam 'dun nas gos byas te/ rtag par gong pa gyi gcig bkug te bgreng / lha 'khor mang po
128a6(mdo sde): thams cad 'dus lhags nas/ thams cad rtse gcig sems kyis khyod la bsngags/ shes rab spobs pa ldan pa'i lha mo khyed// tshig mnyam gya nom thams cad
128a7(mdo sde): sbyin par bgyis/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen me des gsol ba btab pa gsan nas gzungs sngags smras pa// / tad+ya thA/ mo ri rtsi ri la b+had d+he/ hing gu le
128a8(mdo sde): ming gu le/ ming gu le b+had d+he/ aM gu she ma ri tsi sam mad tre bi sa ma mad te/ ag gri mag gri ra tsi/ dar tsa b+had de tsi tsi ri/ shiM ri mi ri/ ma nan d+hi/ dam khri ma ri tsi/ pa ra
128b1(mdo sde): na par+ya/ lo ka tse sh+tse/ lo ka she la/ bi ra tse lo ka b+hi re sid d+ha ba ra te/ bi ma mu khri/ shu tse tse ra/ a pa ri d+hi ka te a pa ra te/ ha da bud d+he/ ma mo tsi mahA/ prad te brir
128b2(mdo sde): gri ni/ na mo skar bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bud d+hi dra shri hi ba d+hi/ a pra di ra ha/ rA ba ba tu si b+ha me ba shud rtsi te/ sha tA/ shu lo ka/ man+ta bi d+hi ka/ ka pi la d+hi sho/ tad+ya thA/
128b3(mdo sde): ma hA pa ra ba bad/ hi li mi li/ hi ma mi pa tsa to// be tsa to to bai bud d+he/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bde d+hi pa shud d+hi pa ga ba da t+yaM/ be ba lam/ sa ra sAt+ya/ ka re dwe kye yu
128b4(mdo sde): re/ ke yu ra mad d+he/ hi li mi li/ a pa ya mi/ ma hA de be bud d+ha sa de na/ sang ga sad te na/ in tra sad te na/ ba ru na sad de na/ ye lo kye sad t+ya sid d+hi na/ ti shams
128b5(mdo sde): da de na sad d+he bad tsi ni na/ a ba ha ya mi/ ma hA d+he b+ha/ ha li mi li la/ hi li mi la ba tse ra to// bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bud d+he/ na mo b+ha ga bag ti/ ma hA de be/ sa ra
128b6(mdo sde): sad tra/ sa yid tan du man tra pa d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen pos gzungs sngags 'di bstan nas/ bram ze de la 'di skad ces/ kye skyes bu chen po
128b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi ched du spobs pa gya nom pa dang / rin po che dang rdzu 'phrul dang shes rab yongs su gnyer nas thams cad la rgya cher ban gtags te/ myur du byung
128b8(mdo sde): chub mngon du byed pa legaso legaso// de ltar shes par byas nas cho ga 'di bzungs par bya'o// zhes smras nas/ yang tshigasu bcad de smras nas/ thogs mor
129a1(mdo sde): gzungs 'di 'a ton du/ byas zhing nor ba med par bslabs nas ni/ byin gyis brlabs cing smon pa rdzogs bya'i phyir/ dkon mcho
129a2(mdo sde): gsum dang lha rnams skyabs 'gro zhing // rtag par sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal nyan thos tshogs la gus phyag 'tshal de 'og tshangs
129a3(mdo sde): dang rgya byin lha dbang dang / 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal po chen po bzhi/ rtag par tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la/ rtse gcig gus pas phyag byas nas// dgon pa
129a4(mdo sde): rab tu dben pa'i phyogs dag tu// skad cher snga ma'i sngags dang cho ga 'don// sangs rgyas sku gzugs lnga klu'i 'don dag tu// ji tsam 'byor pas sgrub par
129a5(mdo sde): bya/ sems can rnam pa de dag thams cad la byams dang snying rjes brtse ba'i sems kyang skyed// bcom ldan gser 'dog shin du bya nom mtshan// g.yeng ba
129a6(mdo sde): med sems rtse gcig dran par bya// bcom ldan yang dag chod stan dgongs mdzad pas// dbang po ji bzhin ting 'dzin sgom la 'god// de'i tshig gi don ni legs
129a7(mdo sde): sems la// stong pa nyid brten rab tu sgom par byas// bcom ldan sku gzugs dag gi spyan sngar ni// rtse gcig yang dag dran pas gnas byed na// gya nom
129b1(mdo sde): ye shes ting nge 'dzin dag dang // gzungs mchog dam pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan yang dag gser zhal chos stan nas// gya nom dbyangs kyi lha mi 'dul
129b2(mdo sde): bar mdzad// ljags mtshan rkyen bzhin ngo mtshar rab ston pas// ljags rings stong gsum 'jig rten khyab par mdzad// bcom ldan gsung dbyangs gya nom
129b3(mdo sde): de 'dra ba// rtse gcig dran na sems la 'jigs med thob// bcom ldan smon lam rgya chen btab pa'i dbang // ljags mtshan bsam kyis mi khyab 'di brnyes nas/
129b4(mdo sde): chos rnams yod pa ma yin gsung mdzad pas// dper na nam mkha' chags pa med pa 'dra// bcom ldan gsung dbyangs dag dang ljags mtshan rnams// dran pa
129b5(mdo sde): nye bzhag byed smon rdzogs par 'gyur// gal te lha mo spobs chen mchog mthong ngam// slob mas slob dpon rjes slob mthong nas ni// gsang ba'i cho ga 'di
129b6(mdo sde): blangs bsgom byed dam// bla mar byed na sems la bsam pa 'grub// gang zhig ye shes dam pa mchog 'dod na// rtse gcig sems kyi chos 'di bzung bar bya/
129b7(mdo sde): gsod nams ye shes yon tan 'phel byed pas// nges par 'grub byed the tshom yod ma bskyed// nor tshol dag ni nor mang rnyed par 'gyur// brags pa rnyed pa
129b8(mdo sde): grags chen thob par 'gyur// nges 'byung tshol ba rnam par grol 'gyur bas// nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yong ma bskyed/ yon tan tshad med mthu
130a1(mdo sde): yas ji snyed pa// sems la bsam bzhin yongs su grub par byed// gal te de ltar chos bzhin spyod nus na// nges par 'grub 'gyur/
130a2(mdo sde): the tshom yod ma skyed// gtsang mi gnas su gos gtsang bgos nas ni// dkyil 'khor che chung ji tsam nus pa bya// bum pa gtsang ma bzhi ni phyogs bzhir dri zhim
130a3(mdo sde): bskrad// me tog spob spos ci 'byor mchod pa bya// lnga ldi bdag dag dang gdugs bris te// byug spos phye ma kun du khyab pa rgyan nas// sangs rgyas lha mo spobs chen
130a4(mdo sde): mchod byed na// lha lus mthong bar 'dod na'ang smon bzhin 'grub// lha mo spobs chen mdun du snga ma sngags// zhag ni nyi shu gcig gdon par bya// gal te lha de
130a5(mdo sde): mthong bar gyur pa na// rtse gcig sems kyi zhag dgu dran par bya// nam gyi cha srad 'on kyang ma mthong na// gnas tsang dam pa gzhan dag gtsang la nas ni// lha mo
130a6(mdo sde): spobs chen gzugs ni rab bris te// mchog nas zlas brjod sems kyi mi btang zhing // gnyid dang le lo sems ni mi bskyed na// bdag dang gzhan la phan thogs
130a7(mdo sde): mthar thug med// rnam smin gang thob skye dgu smin byed na// smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed// gal te yid bzhin ma grub zla ba gsum// yang
130a8(mdo sde): na drug dang lo gcig par// rab brtson gsol 'dobs sems ni mi g.yon// lha'i mig dang gzhan sems shes thob 'gyur// de nas bram ze 'di rgyas de skad
130b1(mdo sde): ces smras pa thos pa dang / dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces/ kye khyed cag lha'i 'khor mang po rnams shes par byos
130b2(mdo sde): la sems brtse gcig tu deng bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la brten nas/ lha mo spobs pa mchog dam pa la sngags pa brjod pa nyon cig ces smras
130b3(mdo sde): nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten dag na dbang phyug thob 'gyur ba// lha mo mthu chen thob la gus phyag 'tshal// derang bdag gtso mo de la rab sngags
130b4(mdo sde): pa// sngon gyi drang srong ji skad bstan pa bzhin// bkra shis yongs rdzogs sems can bde bar gnas// sems gsal ngo tsha khrel yod grags dang ldan// ma
130b5(mdo sde): ma byas te 'jig rten rab tu bskyed// rab dpa' rtag tu brtson 'grus chen po spyod// 'thab mo'i g.yul du rtag par kun du rgyal// rab dul byams sems bzod
130b6(mdo sde): pa gsol bar byed// da lta gshin rje'i sring mo chen mor gyur// rtag par gos su dar tshon ser po gyon// sdug dang mi sdug byed bzhin kun dang ldan// mika gis
130b7(mdo sde): mthong ba thams cad rab tu sdang // slod mchog dam pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das// phyogs shing mngon dang mi kun yongs su sdud// res 'ga' ri brag zab
130b8(mdo sde): mo dag na gnas// res 'ga' brag phug gtsang po'i 'gram na gnas// res 'ga' ljon shing nags tshal chen por gnas// lha mo phal cher de dag kun du
131a1(mdo sde): gnas// ri dgas nags tshal mi rgod ji snyed pa// rtag par lha mo la ni mchod par byed// rma bya'i spros ni rgyal mtshan ba dan byin// dus
131a2(mdo sde): so cig tu rtag par 'jig rten skyong // rtag dang seng ge sbrang gis rgyun du bskor// snag lug bya la sogs pa'i rten yang 'cha'// dril chen bsgrags nas sgra ni byung
131a3(mdo sde): bas na// byin ta'i ri la sgra ni kun du grags// res 'ga' rtse gsum tri shul thogs byed cing // g.yas g.yon rgyun du nyi zla ru mtshon 'dzin// zla ba nag po'i
131a4(mdo sde): tshes gu bcu gcig la// de'i dus su rtag par mchod par bya// res 'ga' ba su lhan chen sring mor ston// g.yul 'gye de mthong na rtag par snying yang rtse// ses
131a5(mdo sde): can thams cad rnam par blta ba la// lha mo mchog tu gyur pas 'das pa med// res 'ga' ba rje'i bu morga mor ston// lha mong 'thab tshen rtag par rgyal ba thob/
131a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag na yun ring gnas par byed// rab du la bzod dang khro rdul ston par byed// bram ze chen po rig pa'i chos bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul sngags sogs thams
131a7(mdo sde): cad rab tu rtogs// drang srong dag na rang dbang dag dang ldan// sa bon dang ni sa chen byed/ par nus// lha mo'i bu mo la sogs 'dus pa'i che// rgya mtsho brlabs
131a8(mdo sde): ltar nges par deng yang 'du// klu dang gnod sbyin mang po'i tshigs kun gyis// gtso bor gyur pas rab tu dul bar byed// bud med nang na tshangs spyod mchog dang
131b1(mdo sde): ldan// tshig byung dper na 'jig rten bdag po 'dra// rgyal po'i gnas na pad ma dag dang mtshungs// chu bo'i 'gram na gnas tshe gru zam bzhin// byad bzhin sdug mdzes zla
131b2(mdo sde): ba nya ba 'dra// mang thos phun tshogs gnas dang rten yang byed// slob pa mchog byung ri rtse mthon po 'dra// dran pa thams cad kun gyi gling yang byed// lha ma yin la sogs
131b3(mdo sde): te lha tshogs rnams// thams cad 'di yi yon tan bsngags par byed// mig ston brgya byin lha'i dbang pos kyang // gus pa'i sems kyi lta zhing rab tu rtog/ sems
131b4(mdo sde): can gang zhig re zhig tshol ba yod// de dag thams cad myur du 'grub par byed// yid myur spros dang chos 'dzin ldan byed pas// sa chen steng na mchog tu gyur pa yin//
131b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu// mar me tsha ltar rtag par kun gsal byed// tha na lha 'dre spun zan dag la yang // de dag bsam bzhin thams cad rdzogs
131b6(mdo sde): byed 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi nang na ri rtse 'dra// sngon gyi drang srong ji bzhin yun ring gnas// lha mo bzhin du ji bzhin 'dod chags spangs// 'jig rten bdag
131b7(mdo sde): po che bzhin bden tshig smra// 'jig rten kun gyi khyed par rgyun rnams dang // 'dod khams lha'i khang pa kun lhas nas// lha mo 'ba' zhig gtso bor grags pas na/
131b8(mdo sde): sems can mchog tu gyur pa yod mi sdang // gal te g.yul 'gyed 'jigs pa'i gnas dag dang // me dor ltung ba dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// nu bo nyams pa
132a1(mdo sde): chom rkun 'jigs pa'i tshe// 'jigs pa de dag thams cad sel bar nus// gal te rgyal po'i khrims kyis bcings sgrib sam// gal
132a2(mdo sde): te cha shas gsod par byed pa'i tshe// sems ni brtse gcig mi g.yo gnas gyur na// nges par mya ngan sdug bsngal kun las thar// dge sdig mi kun yongs su skyob
132a3(mdo sde): pas na// byams dang snying rje brtse bas rtag sngon snang // de phyir bdag ni bsam pa brtse gcig tu// lha mo che la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi// de nas bram ze
132a4(mdo sde): des sngags dang // sngags pa'i tshig gis lha mo de la mngon par bstod pa// 'jig rten gartsol phyag 'tshal gus phyag 'tshal// ma rnams nang na kun gyi
132a5(mdo sde): mchog gyur pas// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bston// byad bzhin rab mdzes kun gyi lta bar mos// yon tan dam pa sna tshogs rab tu brgyan//
132a6(mdo sde): mig yangs pad+ma sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra// bsod nams ye shes snang ba'i grags pas khyab// dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu mtshungs// deng bdag
132a7(mdo sde): dam pa khyod la sngags pas na// sems la bsam pa thams cad grub par 'gyur// yang dag yon tan bkra shis gya nom pa// pad ma lta bur shin du rnam pa
132a8(mdo sde): dag// lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis lta bar mos// mtshan yang ngo mtshar bsam gyis yong mi khyab// dri med ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas// dran
132b1(mdo sde): pa kun gyi nang na mchog tu gyur// ji ltar seng ge spyan zan mchog gyur ltar// rtag par lag pa brgyad kyis bdag nyid brgyan// so sor mda' gzhi ral gri sta
132b2(mdo sde): ri dang // mtho rings lcags kyi 'khor lo thogs// rab mdzes lha mo zla ba nya ba 'dra// tshig la thogs med dbyangs snyan 'byin par byed// sems can gang
132b3(mdo sde): zhig sems la smon yod na// skyes bu dam pas bsam bzhin rdzogs par byed// brgya byin lha mang kun gyi khyod mchod nas// thams cad sngags brjod
132b4(mdo sde): skyabs su 'gro byed pa// bas mau gyis mi khyab yon tan bskyed byed pas// dus rnams kun du gus pa bskyed par byed swA hA// gal te stobs can lha mo
132b5(mdo sde): ga sol 'dod no// sngags stong tshig ni 'di las byung ba bzhini// nang par rnam dag sems kyis brtse gcig 'don// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad bas
132b6(mdo sde): bzhin 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la khyod kyis sems can rnams pan gdags shing bde ba sbyin pa'i ched du lhag mo de la bsngags
132b7(mdo sde): pa brjod pas// byin gyis rlobs par gsol ba btab nas// bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur ba legs so legaso zhes bka' stsal to//
132b8(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las// bam po brgyad pa'o// / de nas bram ze ke'u 'di rgyas gong
133a1(mdo sde): du bstan pa de lta bu'i mngon stong pa'i tshig dang // sngags kyi tshig gis lha mo spobs pa chen mo mngon par bstod nas/ 'khor mang po rnams
133a2(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed cag lha mo spobs pa chen mo la gsol btab nas/ snying rtse bas byin gyis brlabs te/ tshe 'di nyid la thogs pa med pa'i sems
133a3(mdo sde): myur ba dang / ye shes chen po dang / tshigs la shin du mkhas pa dang / shes pa rgya chen po thob pa dang / 'brel pa'i gtam gyis phan tshun len 'debs pa dang / tshig
133a4(mdo sde): 'bru'i brgyan yid bzhin du grub nas thogs pa med par 'dod na/ sems brtse gcig tu 'di ltar gus pas gsol ba btab par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
133a5(mdo sde): lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang // sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / 'phags pa thams/
133a6(mdo sde): cad dang / 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i bden tshig grub pa dang / dbang po ji lta bzhin du yang dag par bden tshig gsung ba/
133a7(mdo sde): mi slu ba gsung ba/ bskal pa chen po bye ba tshad med snyed du rtag par yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung ba/ yang dag pa'i bden tshig dang ldan pa thams cad la rjes su yid
133a8(mdo sde): nas phyag 'tshal lo// mi bden pa'i chog ma gsungs pa'i phyir langs shing ring ba'i ljags phyung nas/ nyid kyi zhal dang / 'dzam bu'i gleng dang / gling bzhi pa dang / stong dang
133b1(mdo sde): stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kun du g.yogs nas/ con
133b2(mdo sde): mongs pa'i gdung ba'i thams cad rab tu sel bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ldag kyi mtshan de lta bu dang ldan pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/
133b3(mdo sde): bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba shin du gya nom pa'i spobs pa thams cad dang ldan par smon nas/ sems brtse cig tu srog phyogs so// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs dam
133b4(mdo sde): pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rang rgyal 'phags pa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / zhugs 'bras bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
133b5(mdo sde): pa'i tshig gi spobs pa dam pa dang / drang srong drang lha'i spobs pa dang / tshangs 'khor drang srong spobs pa dam pa dang / lha chen u ma'i spobs pa dam pa dang / skan
133b6(mdo sde): bda' lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rgyal po man si'i spobs mchog dam pa dang / yid bzhin lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rab
133b7(mdo sde): gnas lha'i bu'i spobs mchog dang / rdo rje gsang ba'i spobs mchog dam pa dang / khyab 'jug lha'i spobs pa dab pa dang / lha mo byi ma'i spobs pa dam pa dang / byin
133b8(mdo sde): lnga'i lha mo'i spobs pa dab pa dang / lha mo bzang mo'i spobs pa dam pa dang / sha ri ma ta'i spobs pa dang / ha ri tshig gi spobs pa dam pa dang / gyur pa ta'i skabs pa
134a1(mdo sde): mthang chen mo'i spobs pa dam pa dang / ha ri ma ta'i spobs pa mchog dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa dang / phyogs bcu'i rgyal po'i
134a2(mdo sde): spobs la gus phyag 'tshal/ las mchog ci mnga' thams cad bdag stangs nas/ spobs mchog dam pa mtha' med thob par shog/ slu ba med la gus phyag 'tshal/
134a3(mdo sde): rnam par grol la gus phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags bral la gus bya ba 'tshal// 'ching sgrib spangs la gus phyag 'tshal// rnam dag sems la gus phyag 'tshal/
134a4(mdo sde): 'od dang ldan la gus phyag 'tshal// bden tshig smra la gus phyag 'tshal// rdul chags med la gus phyag 'tshal// don mchog gnas la gus phyag 'tshal// 'khor
134a5(mdo sde): mang bdag la gus phyag 'tshal// spobs pa'i lha la gus phyag 'tshal// bdag gi tshig la thogs med shog/ bdag gis smon cing gnyer ba'i dngos// thams
134a6(mdo sde): cad myur du 'grub par shog/ nad med rtag tu bde legs shing // tshe ring lo nur thob par shog/ rig sngags kun la rab mkhas shing // nan tan byang chub lam
134a7(mdo sde): bsgoms nas// skye dgu rgya chen phan btags te// bsam pa myur du grub par shog/ bdag gis bden cig smras pa dang // bdag gis klu med smras pa dang / lha
134a8(mdo sde): mo'i spobs pa gang yin pa// bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// lha mo khyod ni 'dir gshegs te// cho ga thogs ma mchis bgyi slad du// bdag lus mkhar mi
134b1(mdo sde): sbyar zhugs nas// ming sbyar thobs pa dang ldan shog/ bdag gi yid skyed dbang po yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa nas// tshig de'i mthu slobs dbang gis ni
134b2(mdo sde): bdag gis tshig de smras pa'i ri// don ni ji bzhin grub gyur cig/ thos pa dag ni gus bskyed nas// byas bcud dgason ma gyur cig/ bdag gi spobs pa gnyer ba
134b3(mdo sde): yin// dngos po gal te ma grub na// lha mo'i bden tshig gang yin pa// thams cad rdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// gang gis 'tshams med sdig byas pa// sangs rgyas
134b4(mdo sde): gdung gis 'dul bar 'gyur// de bzhin dgra bcom gang yin dang // dren gzo'i tshog ni ji snyed dang // sha ri'i bu dang me 'gal bu// bcom ldan 'khor nang/
134b5(mdo sde): mchog gyur pa// 'di la sogs pa'i bden tshig rnams// thams cad bdag la grub par shog/ deng bdag sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor// thams cad 'di
134b6(mdo sde): ni spyan 'dren na// thams cad 'dir ni myur gshegs te// bdag gis smon pa rdzogs mdzad gsol// yang dag bden tshig gang gnyer ba// thams
134b7(mdo sde): cad slu ba ma mchis s+ho// gang du 'og min lha man chad// gnas gtsang ris kyi lha dag dang // tshangs chen tshangs lha nye phan dang // tshangs pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor
134b8(mdo sde): rnams dang // stong gsum 'jig rten kun khyab dang // mi mdzes 'jig rten bdag po dang // 'khor mang po ni thams cad kun// deng bdag thams cad sman 'dren na/
134b9(mdo sde): byabs dang thugs rjes rab bskyed de// thams cad brtse bas bzung du gsol// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams dang // 'phrul dga'i lha ni de dag dang // dga' ldan pa'i lha cho ga dang // bamos pa mngon
135a1(mdo sde): rdzogs gyur dang // 'thag bral ba'i lha rnams dang // subacu rtsa gsum lha dag dang // rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha tshogs dang // lji'i 'jo
135a2(mdo sde): ni thams cad dang // sa chu me rlung lha rnams dang / ri rab rten nas gnas pa dang // mtsho bdun ri'i lha tshogs rnams// 'khor ni mang po bcas pa dang // nor rgyas dang
135a3(mdo sde): ni mgo lnga dang // nyi zla gza' skar lha dag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po// 'jig rten bde bar byed pas na// 'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po// sdig pa
135a4(mdo sde): las ni mi byed mos// sangs rgyas kus pa phrog ma dang // de yi bu sdug tha chung dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sprin dang // dri za dang ni lha ma yin// mi 'am ci'i
135a5(mdo sde): 'khor rnams dang // lto phye chen po la sogs pa// bdag ni bcom ldan mthu stobs kyis// de dag thams cad smon 'dren na// byams dang snying rje'i sems bskyed
135a6(mdo sde): na/ bdag la thogs med spobs pa stsol// lha dang ma'i 'khor rnams dang // gzhan gyi sems ni rig gyur pa// thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas ni// bdag
135a7(mdo sde): la slabs pa dam pa stsol// nam ma'a'i khams ni mthar thug dang // chos kyi dbyings kyi sbas pa na// sems can rnam pa ji sred pa// bdag la spobs par
135a8(mdo sde): stsol// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen po/ de skad ces gsol ba btab pa thos pa dang / bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen po legs so// skyes pa la
135b1(mdo sde): bud med gang la la zhig sngags de dang sngags kyi bden par ston pa de dag brten nas/ sngar grong du brtan pa bzhin du cho ga yang dag par blangs te/ dkon mchog
135b2(mdo sde): gsum la gus pas skyab su 'gro zhing / sems brtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar bzhag par byed na/ ci dang ci bsgrub pa thams cad chud ze bar mi 'gyuraro// gzhan
135b3(mdo sde): yang gser 'od dam pa shin du gya nem pa'i mdo sde 'di yang dag par bzung ste klog cing 'don par byed na smon pa thams cad 'bras bu ldan par 'gyur zhing // myur
135b4(mdo sde): du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ sems brtse gcig tu ma byas pa ni ma rtogs so// de'i tshe bram ze de shin du dang ba'i sems kyis dga'
135b5(mdo sde): gyur pas/ thal mo sbar nas spyi bos dag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis
135b6(mdo sde): mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di rgya cher spel nas// mdo sde yang dag par 'dzin pa dag la yongs su skyobs pa dang / yo su bsrung bar byas pa dang / sems can thams
135b7(mdo sde): cad la phan bdags shing bde ba thob par bya ba'i ched du chos lta bu bstan nas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa byin te/ bsod nams tshad med pa bsnyed thob
135b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / sems bskyed pa rnams byang chub la gzhol bar byas pa leg so legs so// // gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i
136a1(mdo sde): rgyal po las/ lha mo spobs pa chen mo'i le'u ste bcwo lnga pa'o// // de nas lha mo dpal stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das
136a2(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong
136a3(mdo sde): ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnams par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang /
136a4(mdo sde): klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par bgyid pa zhig mthong bar gyur na/ bdag gis sems brtse gcig tu gus pas bkur sti dang / mchod
136a5(mdo sde): pa bgyid do// chos smra ba de la 'di lta ste/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang mal cha dang / gsos sman/ yo byad ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun sum
136a6(mdo sde): tshogs par sbar te/ brel cing phongs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// gdugs mtshan du mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i tshig gis don ji snyed pa dag la so sor brtags te/
136a7(mdo sde): yid la bas mo shing yongs su gsal nas/ bde bar gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du rgya cher spel ba'i slad du/ sems can gang la la sangs
136a8(mdo sde): rgyas stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rtag tu thob par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid na/ bskal pa bye ba
136b1(mdo sde): khrab khrig brgya stong tshad me mchis pa snyed du lha dang ma'i longs spyod mchog rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur lagaso// rtag par lo legs shing mu ge'i rgud pa
136b2(mdo sde): bstan du sel bar gyur pas/ skye bo rnams brtan du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'jal bar 'gyur/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe
136b3(mdo sde): myur du byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur bas ngan 'gro gsum dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bgegs gtan du gcod par bgyid lags so//
136b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUr+ya dang /
136b5(mdo sde): gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho zhes babyi ba mtshan pa bcu dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ bdag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun nas/ de bzhi
136b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa des byams pa dang / thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis mthus/ brtse bar dgongs par 'gyur ba'i slad du/ deng bdag gang bsams pa'i gnas
136b7(mdo sde): de dang / gang du ltos pa'i phyogs de dang / gang du gnas pa'i yul de dang de dag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed shin du bde
136b8(mdo sde): ba'i longs spyod myong zhing / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mtsho ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / sdug dang rdo'i snying po dang
137a1(mdo sde): byi ru dang / 'gron bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa rin po che dang ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur lagaso// ngag la la
137a2(mdo sde): zhig tu gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po de klog cing 'don pa des/ gdugs re re bzhig du spos sna tshogs bsregs nas/
137a3(mdo sde): me tog dam pa rnams kyis bdag gi ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo rin po
137a4(mdo sde): che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon han rgya mtsho de la mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gdugs gcig bzhin du/ dus gsum gyi bdag gis ming nas brjod
137a5(mdo sde): cing / rjes su dran par bgyis nas/ logs cig tu spos dang me tog zas mchog rnams kyis bdag la mchod cing / rtag par mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di/
137a6(mdo sde): mnyan par bgyis nas/ bsod nams 'di lta bu dag thos par 'gyur lags so// de nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'di ltar mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa'i
137a7(mdo sde): spad// bdag dang 'khor rnams gnod pa kun dang bral// gos zas ci 'tshal phongs pa ma mchis 'gyur// gzi byin ldan zhing tshe yang dpa' bar dka'/
137a8(mdo sde): sa yi ri yang rtag par 'phel bar 'gyur// lha rnams dus bzhin char ni rab tu 'bebs// lha 'khor de dag rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// skyed mos tshal
137b1(mdo sde): dang 'bru'i lha rnams kyis// nags tshal ljon shing 'bras bu rab 'phel zhing // 'bru rnams thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid// rin chen nor tshol
137b2(mdo sde): bsams pa rdzogs 'gyur zhing // ci dang ci smon bsam bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/
137b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis 'di lngar sngon gyi rgyud rjes su dran nas/ rjes su bsab pa'i phyir/ mchod pa byas pa dang / mkhas pa'i sems can rnams la phan gdags shing bde bar bya/
137b4(mdo sde): ba'i tshad du mdo sde 'di yongs su spel nas/ yon tan zad mi shes par byas pa legaso legs so// / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam
137b5(mdo sde): par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la dpal gyi lha mo
137b6(mdo sde): Na chen mos yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs na lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i grong khyer nor dang ldan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ grong khyer de las
137b7(mdo sde): mi ring ba na me tog dam pa'i bsod nams 'od ces bgyi ba'i kun dga'i rab mchis bde na/ gzhal med khang mchog dam pa rin ce sna bdun las mngon par grub pa zhig
137b8(mdo sde): mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rtag par der gnas lags pas/ gang la la zhig 'bru rnam pa lnga gdugs cig tu 'phel ba dang / bar mdzod rnams rgyas shing
138a1(mdo sde): gang bar 'tshal bas/ gus pas dang ba'i sems bskyed de/ khang pa gcig gtsang mar bgyis nas/ ba glang gi lci ba dogs la zhal zhal
138a2(mdo sde): bgyis te/ bdag gi gzugs brgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i ri mor bris nas/ lus legs par dkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ byug pa dam pas
138a3(mdo sde): byugs te/ khang pa gtsang mi nang du zhugs nas/ bang gi gis chad du gdugs re dus gsum du sangs rgyas de'i mtshan dang / mdo sde 'di mtshan nas brjod par sems
138a4(mdo sde): bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUr+ya/ gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes brjod nas/ me tog dang spos
138a5(mdo sde): rnams thogs nas/ zhal zas gda' ba sna tshogs sems brtse gcig tu dbul bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang spos dang / me tog dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams kyis
138a6(mdo sde): bdag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bza' ba dang / btung ba dag thogs te/ phyogs gzhan du gtor nas/ 'dre srin rnams la bskul bar bgyi'o//
138a7(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i bden tshig gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la gsol ba btab nas/ ci dang ci gnyer ba'i smon lam btab bgyi'o// gal te ji skad smras pa bzhin du brdzun pa ma
138a8(mdo sde): lags na/ gsol ba btab pa don dang ldan par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de'i tshe dpal gyi lha mos dngos pa rig nas/ brtse ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur bas
138b1(mdo sde): de'i khyim du nor dang / 'bru rnams rab tu 'phel bar bgyi'o// de nas sngags bzlas nas bdag g.yar dran par bgyi'o// sngar sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / byang chub sems
138b2(mdo sde): dpa'i ming nas brjod do// sems brtse gcig tu gus pas phyag bgyi'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser
138b3(mdo sde): tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser brgya'i 'od kyi snying po la phag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser gdugs rin po che rtsigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
138b4(mdo sde): rgyas gser gyi me tog 'od zer rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sgron pa chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che chen po'i tog la phyag 'tshal
138b5(mdo sde): lo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag
138b6(mdo sde): med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
138b7(mdo sde): nub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gser mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i rtag tu bshams la
138b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phagasel phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' zhin du bde bar gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar
139a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pas phyag bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la sdug bzlas te/ dpal gyi lha mo bdag g.yar 'dren
139a2(mdo sde): par bgyid na/ sngags 'di'i mthus yongs su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags 'di lta
139a3(mdo sde): ste/ tad thA/ pa ri pun tsha re/ sa nAn d+ha ra shi na/ ma hA bi sha ra ga te/ sa man te bi da ma ma ni/ ma hA ka li ya prad ti/ bi sh+ma ba ni/ sarba a na tha sa d+ha na ni/ su pa ri ti pu re/ a ya
139a4(mdo sde): dar ma ti/ ma hA bi ku bi te/ ma hA mi to// u pa saM hi te/ ma hA kri na shi// u sang gi ri hi te// sa man d+ha d+hi/ a na pa ri ni swA hA// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig
139a5(mdo sde): gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su bzungs pas// bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid na// bdag gis g.yar 'dren pa thos nas// de'i thad du mchis nas smon pa rnams
139a6(mdo sde): 'grub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i dbang bskur ba'i tshig gi ting nge 'dzin mngon par grub pa'i tshig/ yang dag pa'i tshig/ brlab pa ma mchis pa'i tshig/ yang
139a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i spyod pa sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lags pa/ gang la la zhig sngags 'di yang dag pa 'dzin cing klog pa dang / 'don pa des gdugs
139a8(mdo sde): mtshan bdun gyi bar du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par blangs nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sngar so shing bcas nas yang dag par dkrus nas/
139b1(mdo sde): snga dro'i dus kyi tshe spos dang / me tog gis sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bgyis te/ bdag nyid kyi dngos sdig bshags nas/ bdag dang sems can rnams smon
139b2(mdo sde): bamyur du 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yongs su bsngo zhing smon lam gdab par bgyi'o// khang pa cig gtsang ma bgyis pa'am/ yang na dben pa'i gnas sam
139b3(mdo sde): dben pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ ba glang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas tsan dran bsregs te/ mchod pa bgyi'o// bstan mchog cig bting te/ ba dan dang /
139b4(mdo sde): gdugs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog dam pa rnams kyis nang du bkram te/ sems brtse gcig tu sngags snga ma bzlas te/ bdag der 'chi ba re bar bgyi'o//
139b5(mdo sde): bdag de'i tshe de la sems shing blta bar bgyid pas/ de'i khang bur zhugs te/ stan la mchis nas/ de slan chad mi de g.yar lam na bdag mthong bar gyur
139b6(mdo sde): pas/ ci dang ci smon pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag pa'i tshig gis bka' bgo nas go bar bgyid do// grong ngam grong khyer ram/ 'brog dgon pa 'am/ dge 'dun
139b7(mdo sde): gyi gtsug lag khang rung ste/ ci dang ci smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas/ gser dang / dngul dang / nor dang rin po che dang / ba glang dang
139b8(mdo sde): lug dang / 'bru rnams yid bzhin du thob par 'gyur zhing / bde ba'i longs spyod par 'gyur lags so// de ltar 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mchog
139b9(mdo sde): 'ab ngang
140a1(mdo sde): @dam pa thob nas/ bskal ba mchog gang lags pa des dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing bi dag la yang stsal bar bgyid do// chos kyi
140a2(mdo sde): 'dus pargya che bshams nas/ bza' ba dang btung ba rnams sbyar te/ spos dang me tog chal du bkram nas mchod par bgyi'o// mchod pa bgyis nas mchod pa
140a3(mdo sde): bgyis pa'i zas lhag ma ci mchis pa gtsongs te/ rin blangs nas yang mchod pa bgyis nam 'tsho'i bar tu rtag tu de na gnas nas/ gang zag de la bsrung zhing skyob
140a4(mdo sde): pa dang / phongs shing brel ba ma mchis pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do// dus dus su dbul phongs rnams la yang btsal bar bgyid
140a5(mdo sde): do// bdag cig pu'i ched du ser snas phangs par mi bgyi'o// rtag par mdo sde 'di spangs nas rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bgyis te/ bsod nams cim
140a6(mdo sde): mchis pa de yang thams cad la btang zhing byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas/ 'khor ba las nges par 'byung zhing myur du rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur bar
140a7(mdo sde): smon par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha mo la khyod 'di ltar mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel nas/ bdag gzhan gnyis la phan pa bsam gyis
140a8(mdo sde): mi khyab pa bas pa legs so legs so// zhes sngags pa brjod par 'gyur to// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/
140b1(mdo sde): las/ dpal gyi lha mos nor 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas sa'i lha mo stan ma 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/
140b2(mdo sde): gus pas thal mo sbar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar
140b3(mdo sde): ram slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ gal te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/ dgon pa'i gnas sam ri 'am phug gam nags tshal dag na yang
140b4(mdo sde): rung ste/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di spel bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis nas/ mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / yongs su
140b5(mdo sde): bskyab pa bgyis te/ rgya cher spel bar bgyid do// sa phyogs gang na yang rung ba dag tu chos smra ba'i mkhan pa'i chad du khri thon po btsugs te/ mdo sde 'di 'chang
140b6(mdo sde): par bgyid na/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus lus mi 'da' bar bgyis nas der mchis te/ de'i rkang pa nas spyi bos 'degs par bgyid de/ bdag chos thos
140b7(mdo sde): par gyur nas kyang shin du dang ba'i bsam pas rab tu dga' bar bgyid do// chos kyi ri thob pa'i dbang gis gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ mgu ba tshad
140b8(mdo sde): ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ste/ bdag nyid de lta bu'i phan yon thob pa nyid kyis sa chen po 'di yang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la
141a1(mdo sde): thug pa tshun chad sa'i bcud rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do// rgya mtsho chen po gzhi tshun chad kyi sa chen po ji snyed pa de dag sa'i bcud rgyas shing
141a2(mdo sde): rab tu gshin pas sngon pas kyang lhag pa dang / ches khyed par du 'bags par bgyid do// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na chu bo dang / rdzing dang rdzing bu dang / ljon shing dang sman
141a3(mdo sde): dang / nags tshal dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang / rtsa dang sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs ci mchis pa de dag kyang dbyibs mdzes shing yid du mchi ba
141a4(mdo sde): dang / mang po kun gyis lta bar mos pa dang / kha dog dang dri phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spong du rung bar bgyid de sems can gang gis bza' ba dang / btung ba mchog
141a5(mdo sde): de lta bu dag la longs spong ba rnams kyang tshe ring zhing kha dog dang stobs dang ldan pa/ dbang po rnamos bde zhing gzi byin 'phel ba dang / bro nad ma mchis pa dang / sems kyi/
141a6(mdo sde): shes rab dpa' zhing ci yod brtsol ngo thog par bgyid lags so// gzhan yang sa chen po 'di las ji tsam du yongs su bcad par 'gyur ba'i dngos po brgyad stong ji snyed pa
141a7(mdo sde): thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na 'dzam bu'i gling rnams su rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang / mi rnams dang
141a8(mdo sde): zhing rgyas pa dang / gnod pa rnams mchis pas sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad bde ba myong bar 'gyur lag so// de ltar lus dang sems kyis bde
141b1(mdo sde): ba myong bar gyur nas kyang mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la shin du gus pa bskyed nas/ gang du gnas kyang rung ste thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang
141b2(mdo sde): bla mar bgyis shing sngags pa brjod par smon par gyi'o// gzhan yang chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po chen po de dag kyang chos 'chad pa'i gnas der mchis te/ sems can rnams
141b3(mdo sde): kyi chad du mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di 'chang bar gsol ba btab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di bshad pa'i dbang gis bdag cag
141b4(mdo sde): gis 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la smon par 'gyur zhing / 'od dang kha dog dang mthu stobs dang / dpa' zhing gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / byang bzhin shin du sdug cing sngon
141b5(mdo sde): pas ches khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur bas so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sa'i lha mo stan ma yang chos kyi ros tshim par 'gyur ba'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling dpag
141b6(mdo sde): tshad bdun stong tshun chad sa thams cad bcud dang ldan pa dang / snga ma bzhin du sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bde ba myong bar bgyid lags so// de bas na bcom
141b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de'i tshe sems can de dag gis kyang bdag gi drin bsab pa slad du/ bdag cag gdon mi 'tshal bar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan nas bkur sti dang / rim gro dang
141b8(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyis nas/ bla mar bgyis sngags pa brjod par bgyi'o// snyam du bsam par bgyi'o// de ltar bsams kyang gnas nas byung ste/ grong dang grong khyer
142a1(mdo sde): dang / grong brdal dang / khang khyim dang dgon pa'i gnas gang du chos bshad pa'i dus pa der mchis nas/ chos bshad pa'i mkhan po la
142a2(mdo sde): spyi bos btung de phyags bgyis nas mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// mdo sde 'di mnyan nas kyang so so nas rang gi gnas su mchis te/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed
142a3(mdo sde): de/ 'di skad du bdag cag deng shin du zab cing bla na ma mchis pa'i chos gya nom pa thob nas/ 'dis ni bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de snyed yongs su bsdus
142a4(mdo sde): par gyur to// mdo sde 'di'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis bdag cag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis shing / mtha' mchis pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro bgyis
142a5(mdo sde): pas/ ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal shin du mi bzad pa dang bral bar gyur to// ma 'ongs pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong gi bar da yang rtag par mtho ris dang / mi'i nang
142a6(mdo sde): du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe mi mang po de dag so so nas slar rang gi gnas su mchis nas kyang / skye bo mang po
142a7(mdo sde): rnams la mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las gsungs pa'i dpe cig tsam 'am/ le'u cig tsam 'am/ sngon gyi gtam rgyud cig tsam 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa cig gi
142a8(mdo sde): mtshan tsam 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' cig gi ming tsam 'am/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam 'om/ yang tshig cig tsam zhig sems can rnams la
142b1(mdo sde): ston par bgyid dam/ tha na mdo sde 'di'i mtshan tsam zhig brjod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de dag thams cad
142b2(mdo sde): bcur dag ldan zhing gzhan pas lhag par 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po las skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang rgya cher rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur zhing rgyas pas
142b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams shin du bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ro// rin po che dang nor meng par 'gyur/ sbyin pa legs par gtong bar 'gyur/ rtag par sems
142b4(mdo sde): brtan zhing dkon mchog gsum la mngon pararo yid ches par 'gyur lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo stan ma la
142b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig cig tsam zhig thos
142b6(mdo sde): par gyur na yang tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum dang / lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di
142b7(mdo sde): mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir/ khang khyid dag rab tu brgyan nas/ bla re cig bre bar byed pa 'am/ ba dan cig tsam sbyor bar byed na/ rgyu dang rkyen des lnga'i rigs drug po/
142b8(mdo sde): ngag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin skye bar 'gyur bas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang mchog tu mang ba dag la yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur ro// so so//
143a1(mdo sde): \u0f7f/ nas lha'i bu mo bdun stong tsam dang phan num lhan cig che zhing nyin mtshan rtag par byed par du 'phags pa'i bden pa byasams kyis maM/
143a2(mdo sde): khyab pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas sa'i lha mo sngon mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
143a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgya dang rkyen des na 'khor bzhi po las gang la la zhig chos kyi stan la mchis nas/ chos 'di yang dag par ston pa na/ bdag gdugs mtshan du gang zag de la
143a4(mdo sde): yongs su bsrungs zhing yongs su skyob par bgyid/ rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas/ chos kyi stan drung du mchis te/ de'i rkang pa nas 'degs par bgyid lags so//
143a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ mdo sde 'di ni sems can de dag gis/ sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bkrun pas na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher 'phel
143a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / nub par mi 'gyur lags so// sems can gang gis mdo sde 'di mnyan par byed pa de dag na slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
143a7(mdo sde): brgya stong tshad ma mchis snyed kyi bar du/ lha dang mi'i nang du rtag par bde ba mchog la longs spyod por 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mang po 'jal nas myur du bla na med pa yang
143a8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so// de nas
143b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo stan mas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po lha dang mi rnams la phan 'dogs shing thams
143b2(mdo sde): cad la bde bar bgyid pa mchis/ skyes pa dang bud med dang / 'khor bzhi po dag las gang la la zhig bdag gi lus yang dag par mngon sum du 'tshal ba des/ sems
143b3(mdo sde): brtse gcig tu bzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ ji ltar smon pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do// 'di lta ste nor dang rin po che'i gter/
143b4(mdo sde): dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring ba'i sman dam pa gnyer ba dang / sems can gyi nad mang po gso ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgra pham par bgyi ba dang / tha dad par
143b5(mdo sde): smra ba rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na/ khang pa gtsang mar bgyis te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// lus dkrus te gos sar pa gtsangs ma dgos nas/ stan gtsang ma'i steng
143b6(mdo sde): du mchis te/ ring srel dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ yang na ring srel dang byas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bdug pa bsregs te me tog tor nas/ bza' ba dang
143b7(mdo sde): btung bdag gis mchod pa bgyis te/ zla ba yang gyi ngo ches brgyad la skar ma rgyal gyi rdzogs pa na g.yar 'dren pa'i sngags 'di bzla bar bgyi'o// / tad+ya thA/
143b8(mdo sde): tsi ro tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ku Tu ku Tu/ to tu to tu/ b+ha ha b+ha ha/ pa sha pa sha swA hA// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di 'khor bzhi po gang la la/
144a1(mdo sde): zhig gis lan brgya rtsa bzlas nas bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/ bdag gis de'i ched du g.yar 'dren pa der 'chi bar 'gyur lags so//
144a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig bdag dngos mthong zhing lhan cig gtam bgyid par 'tshal na/ yang snga ma bzhin du cho ga shams nas gzungs
144a3(mdo sde): 'di bzla bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ a na tsa ne kri lig k+She na ne/ shi ra shi d+ha ne/ ha ha he he/ ku ru ba re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig sngags 'di 'don pa na/ lan brgya
144a4(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags snga ma yang 'don par bgyid na/ bdag gdon mi 'tshal bar lus mngon sum du bstan nas/ des ji ltar smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
144a5(mdo sde): par bgyid pas/ nams kyang chab 'tshal bar mi bgyid do// gal te sngags 'don par 'tshal na/ sngar lus bsrung ba'i sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ni
144a6(mdo sde): shi ri mi shi ka ni/ na ki ku te/ b+hud mi b+hud d+hi ri/ de ti bu ti/ ku ku ti kha pa tsi swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'don pa'i che tshon sna lnga'i kud pa blangs nas sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig
144a7(mdo sde): bzlas te/ ma dad pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyis nas dpung pa la bcings na/ slan chad lus bsrung bar bgyis pas 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig
144a8(mdo sde): sems brtse gcig tu sngags 'di zlos par bgyid na/ bsams pa rnams yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur te// bdag sho be ma mchis te bdag gi dbang du sangs rgyas
144b1(mdo sde): dang chos dge 'dun dkon mchog bzhugs pas mang ba nyid du rab tu mkhyen par 'gyur ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod
144b2(mdo sde): yang dag pas bden tshig gi sngags kyis btab pa'i rgyal po 'di dang / chos smra ba dag la yongs su bsrung ba leg so leg so// rgyu dang rkyen 'dis khyod bsod nams
144b3(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa tshad med pa snyed pa thob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ sa'i lha mo stan ma'i le'u ste
144b4(mdo sde): bcwo brgyad pa'o// // de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bya ba/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad po dag dang lhan cig tu 'khor
144b5(mdo sde): mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrog pa cig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pI lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
144b6(mdo sde): sbar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram slad
144b7(mdo sde): pha ma'i dus kyi che/ grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam ri 'am dgon pa'am/ nags tshal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dge 'dun gyi gnas dag
144b8(mdo sde): kyang ste/ yang dag par bstan nas rgya cher spel bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu
145a1(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu der mchis te/ so so nas rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas/ ci rigs pa chos smra ba'i mkhan po de dang /
145a2(mdo sde): chos nyan pa'i 'khor de dag la yongs su bsrungs nas/ gnod pa rnams spangs te/ rtag par bde ba myong bar bgyid do// skyes pa 'am bud med dmakhye'u 'am/
145a3(mdo sde): bu mo gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa cig gam/ tshigs su bcad pa cig yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ tshig cig tsam yang dag par 'dzin
145a4(mdo sde): bar bgyid pa'am/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par bgyid dam/ mdo sde 'di las gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa cig gi mtshan tsam 'am/ byang
145a5(mdo sde): nub sems dpa' cig gi ming tsam brjod par sems bskyed nas gus pas rim gro dang / mchod pa bgyis nas/ bdag gis yongs su bsrungs zhing byin gyis
145a6(mdo sde): brlabs nas/ gnod pa mchis par bgyis te/ sdug bsngal nas bde ba thob par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag ming yang dag shes zhes kyi
145a7(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du mkhyen pa lags te/ bdag gis chos rnams rig pa dang / bdag gis chos thams cad
145a8(mdo sde): kyi ji snyed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba dang / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / bye brag ji snyed pa thams cad gsal gsal bar rtogs
145b1(mdo sde): ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos rnams bdag gis khong du chud par 'gyur bas/ bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa dang /
145b2(mdo sde): bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan po dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i
145b3(mdo sde): spyod yul rnams mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis chos thams cad yang dag par rig/ yang dag par gsal
145b4(mdo sde): bar rtogs/ yang dag par khong du chud/ yang dag par so sor rtogs par bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang
145b5(mdo sde): dag shes zhes bgyi ba lags te/ don de'i slad du bdag gi chos smra ba'i mkhan po de'i tshig gi spobs pa gsal zhing brgyan dang ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang mdangs
145b6(mdo sde): ba spu'i bu ga kun nas 'jug pa dang / lus kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang / dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba thams
145b7(mdo sde): cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa thob nas spang kong ba ma mchis pa dang / de'i lus la phan 'dogs shing nyams pa ma mchis pa dang / dbang
145b8(mdo sde): po rnams bde zhing rtag par dka' ba bskyed par bgyid do// rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
146a1(mdo sde): nas/ bsod nams kyi las mngon par bsgrub pa dag gi ched du 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu rgya cher spel nas/ myung du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyi
146a2(mdo sde): pas/ sems can de dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa thob par
146a3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / slad ma'i dus kyi tshe yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshad ma mchis pa'i bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lha dang mi'i bde ba myong ba dang / rtag par
146a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mang po dang 'jal nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang ngan song gsu
146a5(mdo sde): gyi sdug bsngal shin du mi bzad pa dag kyang myong bar mi 'gyur lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces
146a6(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs mchis te/ sems can rnams la sman par bgyi zhing brtse ba'i slad du/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar
146a7(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyis bshad par bgyi'o// de nas sngags smras pa// / na mo bud d+ha ya/ na mo d+harma ya/ na mo pra ma ya/ na mo in tra ya/ na mo tsan dru nam/ mo hA ra sha
146a8(mdo sde): ra nam/ tad+ya thA/ hi le hi le/ mi le mi le/ gu re ma hA gu ri/ ma hA kan d+hi/ d+ha ra mya/ ma hA d+ha ra myi kye/ d+han da khu gun hwe/ ha ha ha ha ha/ ho ho ho ho ho/ ha lo d+ha ma b+he/
146b1(mdo sde): kud ma ge tsa tsa tsag tsi tsa tsi tsi/ tsu tsu tsu cu/ shUn d+ha ba la/ shi kra shikra/ ud d+ha sh+ma he/ b+ha ga ba ma/ sing shin d+hi la swA hA// gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'dzin par bgyid
146b2(mdo sde): na/ bdag gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad sman dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rin po che ngo mtshar che ba dag gis rim gro bgyid do// gal
146b3(mdo sde): te skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo dang / gser dang dngul dang rin po che dang / brgya phreng gi rnam pa rnams yongs su gnyer bgyid na/ yang bdag gis thams cad
146b4(mdo sde): sbyar nas/ ji ltar smon pa bzhin rgud cing phongs par mchis par bgyid do// rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan pas sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ cho ga ci rig par bgyis nas/
146b5(mdo sde): thog ma kho nar gnod sbyin yang dag shes kyi gzungs bar du chag pa bzhi lnga tsam mchis pa sug pa na dgra rta thogs par ri mor bri bar bya'o// gzugs brnyan de'i mdun du
146b6(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ bum pa bzhi sbrang rtsi'i chab bam bu ram gyi tshabs kyis bka' ste bzhad nas/ byug pa dang / phye ma dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang /
146b7(mdo sde): me tog dang phreng ba rnams kyang bkram par bgyi'o// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ 'gram du thab cig tu bgyis te/ de'i nang du sol ba'i zhugs stsal nas/ ma dang
146b8(mdo sde): yungs dkar sreg te/ snga ma'i sngags de lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ sngags lan re zhing lan cig bsregs na/ bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rang nyid
147a1(mdo sde): drung du mchis nas/ lus mngon du bstan te/ sngags 'don pa'i mi de la khyod ci dgos pa dang / yid la ci 'dod pa'i dngos po gang yin
147a2(mdo sde): pa de smros shig/ ces 'dri bar bgyid do// bdag gis ji skad mchi ba bzhin yongs su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do//
147a3(mdo sde): gal te gser dang dngul dang / gter 'tshal bar gyur tam yang na lha'i drang srong du gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'tshal lam/ lha'i mig gi mngon par shes/ pa dang /
147a4(mdo sde): gzhan gyi sems tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad la yid bzhin du rang dbang thob nas nyon mongs pa bcad de myur du rnam par grol ba la 'khor bar chal na yang thas
147a5(mdo sde): cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar sems can thos
147a6(mdo sde): cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir ris sngags 'di bshad de/ yang dag pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs nas bsod nams kyi mtha' yas pa rnams phan gdags pa legaso
147a7(mdo sde): leg so// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//
147a8(mdo sde): de nas sa'i lha mo stan ma zhes bya ba 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas gus pas thal mo sbyar
147b1(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yul rnams su mi'i rgyal po byed pa la gal te yang dag pa'i chos ma mchis par gyur nas
147b2(mdo sde): yul skyong zhing skye bo mang po rnams kyang bso ba'i rngom thog la/ bdag nyid kyang yun ring du khyed par 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs la gnas par mi 'gyu na/ bcom
147b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das byams pa dang thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag la rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos yul skyong bar bgyid pa gang lags pa bkas
147b4(mdo sde): bshad du gsol/ de nas mi rgyal po rnams chos 'di thos pa'i dbang gis/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrub cing yang dag par 'jig rten 'dul ba dang /
147b5(mdo sde): khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs gtan du 'phel zhing zhi ba dang / yul na gnas pa'i skye bo thams cad la yang smon par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom
147b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du sa'i lha mo stan ma la bka' stsal pa/ khyod legs par nyon cig sngon byang ba 'das pa'i dus nas// rgyal po stobs kyis
147b7(mdo sde): gtso bo'i tog ces bya ba byung ngo // rgyal po de la bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba zhig byung ste/ spyi bo nas dbang skur nas ring por ma lon par de nas/ rgyal po yab
147b8(mdo sde): kyis mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos lha'i bdag po'i snyan dag ces bya ba yod de/ nga sngon spyi
148a1(mdo sde): bo nas dbang bskur nas / yul gyi bdag po byas pa'i tshe/ nga'i yab shes pa'i stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog ces bya bas/ nga la rgyal po'i chos
148a2(mdo sde): lugs ya dag pa'i bstan bcos 'di bstan pas/ ngas bstan bcos 'di la rten lo nyi khri'i bar du yul legs par bskyangs te ngas skad cig gcig tsam gyi bar du chos
148a3(mdo sde): ma yin pa spyad par bya'o snam pa'i bsam pa byung ma myong ngo // deng khyod chos ma yin pas yul skyong bar ma byed cig/ ci'i phyir rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bsta
148a4(mdo sde): bcos zhes bya zhe na/ khyod deng legs par nyon cig dang khyod la bstan par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po gtso bo'i tog gis/ rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa gya nom
148a5(mdo sde): pa dag gis yang dag par bstan bcos mngon par bstan pa/ ngas ni sems can bde ba dang / 'jig rten the tsom bcod pa dang // nyes dmigs mang po bsal
148a6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir// rgyal khrims bstan bcos bshad par bya// lha ma'i bdag po thams cad dang // mi'i rgyal po gang yin pa// dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/
148a7(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas ngas bshad nyon// sngon byung lha 'khor mang po rnams// rdo rje'i ri la 'dus pa na// rgyal bzhi bstan las langs nas ni// tshangs chen la ni 'di
148a8(mdo sde): skad zhus// tshangs bdag mchog tu gtso gyur cing // lha'i nang na dbang phyug che// bdag cag la ni bcer dgongs nas// the tsom rnams ni bcad du gsol/
148b1(mdo sde): ji ltar mi'i 'jig rten skyes// rgyal po zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rgyu dang rkyen gang slad du// lha'i bu zhes bgyi bar 'gyur// ji ltar mir ni skyes pa 'am//
148b2(mdo sde): gcig pu mi'i bdag po thob// ji ltar mtho ris gnas dag tu// lha'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten skyong dag gis// tshangs rgyal de la zhus pa
148b3(mdo sde): dang // de tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po yis// dag la ni 'di skad smras// 'jig rten skyong khyod shes par byos// sems can la ni phan pa'i phyir// nga la yul skyed chos
148b4(mdo sde): dris pas// ngas bshad khyod kyis legs par nyon// sngon gyi las kyi mthu yis ni// lhar skyes rgyal por gyur pa yin// gal te mi nang gnas gyur nas//
148b5(mdo sde): dbang bsdad ma'i bdag po byed// lha rnams lhan cig bin rlabs nas// de 'og ma'i mngal du 'jug/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa na// lha rnams kyis ni bsra
148b6(mdo sde): bas na// lha'i bu zhes brjod pa yin// suM cu rtsa gsum bdag po yis// stobs mgos mi rgyal stongs par byed// lha mi mang po thams cad kyis//
148b7(mdo sde): rang dbang stobs ni rab bstan nas// chos min kun ni rab bsal te// sdig pa'i las ni skye mi byed// sems can dge ba bsgrub sprul nas// mtho ris
148b8(mdo sde): gnas su skye bar byed// ma dang lha min 'khor dag dang // dri za dang ni srin po dang // rdol pa la sogs thams kyis// stobs kyi phyed ni stong par byed//
149a1(mdo sde): pams stobs phyed stong nas ni// sdig spong dge ba bsgrub la 'dzud// lha rnams lhan cig rab srungs nas// dge sdig rnams sprin ston
149a2(mdo sde): par byed// dge sdig las ni byas gyur na// de ltar tshe 'di nyid la ni// lha rnams lhan cig rab bsrungs nas// dge sdig rnam smin ston par byed// yul mis
149a3(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las byas la// rgyal spangs nan tur mi byed na// 'di ni yang dag rigs pa min// chos bzhin chad pas bcad par bya// gal te nyan thos mi 'gog
149a4(mdo sde): na// chos min rab tu 'phel 'gyur bas// rgyal po de'i yul khams su// g.yo sgyu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur// rgyal pos nyes byed mthong ba la/ gal te
149a5(mdo sde): zlog par mi byed na// sum cu rtsa gsum lha 'khor rnams// thams cad khong khro sems skye 'gyur// rgyu des rgyal khrims nyams 'gyur zhing // g.yo
149a6(mdo sde): sgyu 'jig rten 'phel 'gyur bas// pha rol dgra 'khor dag gis ni// yul de bcom nas 'jig par byed// gnas pa'i gam dang yo byed dang // nor bsags
149a7(mdo sde): thams cad stong par 'gyur// g.yo sgyu sna tshogs skyes pas na// phan tshun cig la cig kyang 'phrog/ yang dag chos kyi rgyal thob kyong // chos bzhin du ni
149a8(mdo sde): mi spyod pas// yul mi thams cad 'thor gyur te// glang pos pad ma'i rdzing brdze 'dra// rlung khrag ldang la dus med kyang // mi kho char ni dus min 'bab
149b1(mdo sde): sgyu skar ltas ngan mang po ston// nyi zla gcan zan 'od kyang med// rgyal pos yang dag chos spangs pas// 'bru rnams me tog 'bras bu dang // lo tog thams
