266b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod cing / sems rtse gcig pas phyag 'tshal zhing / de nas sngags 'di gdon par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams
266b7(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// so byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// pags pa nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sang
266b8(mdo sde): rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'jugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che tog la phyag 'tshal lo// ru
267a1(mdo sde): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rnga smra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// steng gi phyogs
267a2(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'go gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal
267a3(mdo sde): lo// sangs rgyas kun du 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun du snang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spos mchog pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
267a4(mdo sde): rgyas pad ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mnyam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen tsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
267a5(mdo sde): rin chen bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dri med 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spobs pas bkod
267a6(mdo sde): par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zla 'od rnam par grag pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas me tog 'od bkod la phyag 'tshalo//
267a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dge 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sbyar ras gzigs
267a8(mdo sde): dbang mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'jigs med grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rab mchog rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
267b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
267b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
267b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
267b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang
267b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas
267b6(mdo sde): gzungs 'di 'don par bya'o// // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti ni/ i si ri to// ko sha ni/ i mi ri Ne/ i ri'i swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
267b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' bde bar gnas pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs/
267b8(mdo sde): kyi bu mo la la zhig gas gzungs 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa tshad med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
268a1(mdo sde): la bkur bsti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / sngags pa byas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
268a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de dag lung ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas pa gang zhig gzungs de 'chang ba des gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / rin po che dang / mang
268a3(mdo sde): du zos shing mkhas pa dang / nad med cing tshe ring ba la sogs pa yid bzhin du thob ste/ bsod nams shin du mang du 'phel lo// ci dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams
268a4(mdo sde): cad grub par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas pa gang gis gzungs sngags 'di 'ching zhing 'dzin na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du/ rtag par byang
268a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer ri bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du
268a6(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ping ga la chen po la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ byang chub
268a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' de rnams kyis bsrung bar byed do// bde bar gnas pa gzungs 'di bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni yin par shes par bya'o// thog mar bzlas brjod khri tsho brgyad chang bar bzla
268a8(mdo sde): pas bsnyen par bya'o// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor byas te/ ches bcu drug gi nyin par zhus byas/ gos gsar pa gyon te bdug pa dang / me tog dang /
268b1(mdo sde): zhal zas stsogs dang rgyan la sogs pas mchod par bya zhing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas// thogs mar sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
268b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing gus pas phyag 'tshal zhing sdig pa bshas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ sngags de stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par
268b3(mdo sde): bya'o// de nas lus bsrang ste 'dug nas ci 'dod pa de bsam par bya'o// de na nyi ma ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha zas gtsang ma za cig par 'aze'o// de
268b4(mdo sde): nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang / bzod dkyil 'khor de nas byung bar byas te/ mi de ni bsod nams dang / gzi brjid kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing / bsam pa
268b5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te bsam pa ma grub na yang / dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas sngar bzhin bsgrubs na/ bsam pa rdzogs par 'gyur bas de phyin chad kyang
268b6(mdo sde): rtag tu rjes su dran par bya'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs ste le'u brgyad pa'o//
268b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzus de gsungs nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / lha dang mi dang lha mi yin la sogs pa'i 'khor
268b8(mdo sde): 'dus pa de dag la phan dang / bde ba'i phyir don dam pa bden pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsus so// bsam gyis
269a1(mdo sde): mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnam/
269a2(mdo sde): mdo tsam bshad par byas// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te/ de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i
269a3(mdo sde): chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang / sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan
269a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams
269a5(mdo sde): cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la spyod// rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod/
269a6(mdo sde): sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu rol rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod// dbang
269a7(mdo sde): po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyum lta bu g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam spyod de// ji ltar mi zhig
269a8(mdo sde): grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa/
269b1(mdo sde): de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang de bzhin du// ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul
269b2(mdo sde): chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang po drag por zhugs par bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni
269b3(mdo sde): shes pa bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'phral
269b4(mdo sde): 'khor 'dra bar gnas/ sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs ge dang phyogs gzhan gnas// dper na sbrul bdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag
269b5(mdo sde): tu phan tshun mthun pa mi yin zhing // khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyog dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te/
269b6(mdo sde): khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag ni// 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yi sbrul dang nu gi sbrul dag ni/
269b7(mdo sde): 'di gnyis steng gi na mkha' 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun du gnas nas dong / lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag
269b8(mdo sde): dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bang kan rlung 'khris pa zang gyur nas/ lus 'di gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i
270a1(mdo sde): phung por gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can gang dag zhig
270a2(mdo sde): yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// mi rig pa yin rkyen khas byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung
270a3(mdo sde): min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas bshad do// yod pa min zhing nam yang yod min la/
270a4(mdo sde): rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ mi rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye
270a5(mdo sde): mched drug dang rig dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang / skye dang rga shi mya nA gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa
270a6(mdo sde): khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam spyad cing // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa gcad par
270a7(mdo sde): bgyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mtsho gro lo// phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyi// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer
270a8(mdo sde): sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun du bstan// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngas ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim byas// ngas ni chos kyi rnga
270b1(mdo sde): chen dam pa'ang brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang 'bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// ngas ni nyon
270b2(mdo sde): mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam
270b3(mdo sde): rnams bkag/ sems can rmongs me yis gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhe byas nas// rten
270b4(mdo sde): dang dpung gnyen dag tu gyur cing // bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad pas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod
270b5(mdo sde): par byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na// rtul shugs bsten pos byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu sdug
270b6(mdo sde): bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig dang gser// bai DUr+ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams car+ya dang /
270b7(mdo sde): nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad bcad brngubs te// de dag thams cad phyir rlags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor
270b8(mdo sde): ji tsam par// phyi ma'i phung po spungs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nas// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams
271a1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes pa des ni rdul rnams kyi// byem
271a2(mdo sde): bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa mi nus//
271a3(mdo sde): thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug par yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
271a4(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// de nas de'i de'i tshe lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro chos bstan pa shin du zab mo de zos na/
271a5(mdo sde): dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes te// 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsug nas
271a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung ngo de/ chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba nu ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad gsol pa/
271a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtso lags te/ 'jigs rten kun tu snang mdzad pa/ byang chub spyod pa yang dag rdul// bdag la thugs rjes bshad du gso// rigs kyi lha mo la bka'
271a8(mdo sde): phul pa// khyod la the tshom ci yod pa// dri ba'i don de zhus shig dang // rnam par phye ste bstan par bya// de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros// bcom ldan 'das
271b1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das bral ba'i// byang chub spyod pa
271b2(mdo sde): ji ltar sbyang // de nas bcom ldan gyis rigs kyi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo chos kyi dbyings la gnas te// byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa ni/
271b3(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos
271b4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings la gnas te// byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad cing mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du gyi ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de ni phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su 'dogs te/ chos
271b5(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ni phung po lnga nyid do// de'i phyir phung po lnga yang brjod du med pa// phung po lnga ma yin pa yang brjod du med pa ste/ de la chos kyi dbyings de nyid phung po lnga yin ni ni chad par
271b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gal te phung po lnga las gzhan par 'dod ni ni rtag par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma ni gnyis dang bral ba/ mtha' gnyis la mi gnas te/ ltar med pa/ blta bar bya ba las 'das
271b7(mdo sde): pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod do// rigs kyi lha mo phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ji ltar gdags zhe na/ phung po lnga po ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa
271b8(mdo sde): ste// de'ang gal te rgyu dang rkyen las bskyed pa zhig yin na ni// bskyed zin pa skye 'am/ mi skye zhe na/ gal te skyed zin pa skye na ni rkyen yang mi dgos par rigs so// gal te ma
272a1(mdo sde): skyes pa skyen ni skye ba dmigs su med par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni yod ma yin pa nyid pas ming med pa/ mtshan ma
272a2(mdo sde): med pa/ gzhal ba dang / dpag pa dang / dper bya bas mi brjod pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi lha mo dper na// rnga yi sgra 'byung ba ni shing dang /
272a3(mdo sde): ko ba dang lag pa la bsten nas sgra 'byung mod kyi/ rnga'i sgra de ni 'das pa'ang stong / ma 'ongs pa'ang stong / da ltar byung ba'ang stong ste/ rnga'i sgra de na shing las kyang ma byung // ko
272a4(mdo sde): ba las kyang ma byung / mi de'i rtsol ba las kyang ma byung mod kyang // thams cad tshogs pa las sgra 'byung zhing // dus gsum gyis ma bskyed pas mi skye ba ste/ gang mi skye ba de ni
272a5(mdo sde): mi 'gog pa'o// gang mi 'gog pa de ni gang nas kyang mi 'ongs pa'o// gang nas kyang mi 'ongs pa de ni gang du'ang mi 'gro'o// gang du yang mi 'gro ba de ni rtag pa dang chad pa ma
272a6(mdo sde): yin pas/ gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te gcig pa yin na chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pas/ 'o na ni byis pa so so'i
272a7(mdo sde): skye bo rnams kyis kyang don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur pas// mya ngan las 'das pa'i bden pa dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de lta me yin pas de gcig pa ma yin
272a8(mdo sde): no// gal te de tha dad pa ma yin na ni// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang / mtshan ma de nyid 'dzin pa yin pas rnam par 'i grol bar yang mi 'gyur
272b1(mdo sde): zhing / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang ma bral bas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mtshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa rnams ni 'dra
272b2(mdo sde): byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa yang dag pa'i ngo bor gcig pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no// de bas na phung lnga po de ni yod pa ma yin// med pa yang mi yin/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis
272b3(mdo sde): bskyed pa yang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen med par bskyed pa yang mi yin no// tshig gis thog tu mi phebs pas ming dang mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen med pa/ dpes bstan du
272b4(mdo sde): med pa/ thog ma dang tha mar dben pa/ rang gis stong pa ste/ de ni sa 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyen par byas pa yin gyi/ gzhan gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o// de'i phyir
272b5(mdo sde): phung po lnga po lnga la chos kyi dbyings ston to// gzhan yang rigs kyi lha mo gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lnga la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don dam
272b6(mdo sde): pa dang / kun rdzob gzhan dang gzhan ma yin par 'dod pa de ni dpag par dka' ba ste/ 'phags pa dang / ma rabs kyi spyod yul ni gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin
272b7(mdo sde): te/ kun rdzob kyang ma spongs/ don dam pa dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
272b8(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mo de rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/
273a1(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la brdugs nas/ thal mo sbyar ba btud de spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
273a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal lo// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po
273a3(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dug pa des/ rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces dris so// lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu bcu
273a4(mdo sde): par bka' ba 'di la/ khyod ji ltar spyod pas de la dbang thob par gyur/ de nas rigs kyi lha mos tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa'i rgyal po ji ltar
273a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don de shin du zab pas so so'i skye bo thams cad de'i don mi shes te/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin pas mchog tu phra ba shes
273a6(mdo sde): bar dka' ba'o// bdag ni chos 'di la bsten te bde bar gnas pa thob po// gal te bdag gi tshig de bden par ldan/ sdigs ma rnam pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
273a7(mdo sde): dag na/ tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cing / mtshan sum bcu rtsanyis dang ldan pa skyes pa yang ma yin// bud
273a8(mdo sde): med kyang ma yin pa shaM stag du gyur cing / rin po chen pad mo la 'dug nas bde ba tshad med pas longs spyod pa dang / lha'i med tog gi char 'bab cing / lha'i sil snyan
273b1(mdo sde): dang rol mo ma bkrol bar rang byung gi mchod pa de lta bu dang / ldan par shog shig ces smras ma thag tu/ snyigs ma rnam pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sem
273b2(mdo sde): can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i pad
273b3(mdo sde): ma la 'dug ste// bde ba tshad med pas longs spyod par gyur pa ni/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzhal med khang pa nang na 'gro thams cad med na cing rin po che'i
273b4(mdo sde): shing ljon sna tshogs bris pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab mas 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang / lha'i me tog gi char 'bab pa/ lha'i rol
273b5(mdo sde): mo sna tshogs kyis longs spyod par gnas pa bzhin gyur ro// de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro yang bud med kyi lus la tshangs pa'i lus su bsgyur cing 'dug go//
273b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa khyod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ smras pa/ tshangs pa'i
273b7(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po// chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyod do// rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyod pa
273b8(mdo sde): spyod do// srig spu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin bdag kyang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// sgra brnyan byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do//
274a1(mdo sde): / de skad ces bshad pa tshangs pa chen pos zos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smra'o// brnyan pa khyod don gang la gnas te de sa
274a2(mdo sde): swa/ lha mos sbas pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos gang dag bden pa'i mtshan nyid du grub pa med cing / rgyu dang rkyen la rten nas grub pa'i phyir ro// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos
274a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ gal te de ltar yin na so so'i skye bo'i thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so//
274a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ skyes bu khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces smra/ byis pa yang gzhan/ mkhas pa yang gzhan/ byang chub kyang gzhan/ byang chub ma yin pa yang gzhan/ rnam par grol ba yang
274a5(mdo sde): gzhan/ rnam par grol ba yang gzhan mod kyi/ tshangs pa chen po chos de dag thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid de/ so so ma yin pa/ yod drug par dbyer med pa/
274a6(mdo sde): bar mtshams med pa/ 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa la mngon par chags shing 'dzin to// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ de'i slob ma sprul pa la mkhas
274a7(mdo sde): shing byang chubar gyur pa zhig gis/ lam gyi gzhi mdor sa dang / shing dang / rba dang / lo ma la sogs pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te/ sgyu ma sprul pa 'di lta ste/ rta dang /
274a8(mdo sde): glang po che'i tshogs dang / dmag dang / shing ta la sogs pa'i tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang / bang ba dang / mdzod la sogs pa kun la bstan te/ de la
274b1(mdo sde): sems can byis pa blun pa mi shes pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis mthong na/ sgyu ma sprul par mi shes te/ rta dang glang po la sogs pa mthong ba dang / gtam zos pa 'di dag nges
274b2(mdo sde): par yang dag par yod pa yin te/ gzhan ni rdzun pa'o snyam du sems shing phyis kyang de la zhib tu rtog par mi byed do// de la skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni de ltar mi lta
274b3(mdo sde): ste/ sgyu ma sprul par shes nas bdag gis thos pa dang mthong ba 'di dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa bdag gis mthong ba 'di dag ni yang dag
274b4(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro ba'i mig slu bar byed pa ste/ rta dang glang po che dang / bang mdzod la sogs pa 'di dag ni der snang ba tsam du zad do/ bdag gis mthong
274b5(mdo sde): ba dang thos bzhin du bden pa ma yin par 'dzin la// phyis zhib tu brtags nas kyang rdzun pa slu ba'i chos su shes par byed do// de bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis ni chos
274b6(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad yang dag pa yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te/ ji lta ba mthong ba dang / rtogs pa yang kun rdzob tsam du de dag gi don mtshon pa dang / tshig gi tha snyad
274b7(mdo sde): la bsten nas yang dge ba'i don shes par bya ba tsam du zad kyi/ dam pa ni de lta ma yin no// snyam mo// yang tshangs pa chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa 'jig
274b8(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par yang mi shes la/ gang mthong ba dang //
275a1(mdo sde): thos pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed yin pa'i chos rnams ji ltar brtags pa ltar bden pa nyid du mngon par zhen te/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin
275a2(mdo sde): nyid brjod du med pa don dam pa'i tshul de shes par mi nus so// de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni gang gzigs shing bsan pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa
275a3(mdo sde): chos rnams kyis mthu dang / las ji lta bu yin pa de la bden pa'o// zhes mngon par mi zhen te/ 'du byed kyi chos kyang mi bden pa/ 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang mi
275a4(mdo sde): bden pa/ yang dag par ma yin pa/ rtogs pas brtags pa tsam du 'du byed dang / 'du byed mi yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam du zad pa/ bden pa'i rang bzhin du
275a5(mdo sde): ma grub pa ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyis kun rdzob kyi tha snyed la brten nas/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i don ston par byed do// de bzhin du tshangs pa chen po yang 'phags pa
275a6(mdo sde): rnams ni 'phags pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis gzigs pa/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa de bzhin du 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i
275a7(mdo sde): chos kyang de bzhin du blta ste/ kun rdzob du meng dang mtshan ma sna tshogs la bsten nas gzhan la ston par byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'gro la tshangs pa chen
275a8(mdo sde): pos 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu/ sems can ji snyed cig gis chos zab mo 'di lta bu rtogs shing shes par nus/ smras pa/ tshangs pa chen po// gang sprul pa mang /
275b1(mdo sde): bo'i sems dang sems las byung bas chos zab mo 'di yang dag par shes par gyur pa de snyed kyis so// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ sprul pa de dag nyid kyang ni/ rang bzhin
275b2(mdo sde): yod pa yin na/ de dag gis sems lngas byung ba gang nas skye bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang chos kyi dbyings yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin par shes pa de dag gis
275b3(mdo sde): zab mo 'di don shes par mi nus so// de nas tshangs pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rin chen
275b4(mdo sde): 'od phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung zab mo 'di la mkhas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ tshangs pa chen
275b5(mdo sde): po de ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis khyod la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du bsgrubs shig dang / mi skye ba'i
275b6(mdo sde): chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po dang gzhan yang tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus
275b7(mdo sde): mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro'i 'arkang pa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so//
275b8(mdo sde): deng skyes bu dam pa khyod dang phrad cing / bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thob par gyur pa ngo mtshar che ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen
276a1(mdo sde): pa la bka' stsal pa/ mangs pa byang chub sems dpa' rin can 'od 'phro 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rin pa che'i 'od dpal gyi spang po zhes byas
276a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/
276a3(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa de'i tshe//
276a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha'i bu khri phrag brgyad stong dang / rgyal po
276a5(mdo sde): dang blon po la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis rdul cing rdul dang bral ba'i chos la/ chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas/
276a6(mdo sde): dge slong khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ byang chub sems las phyir mi ldog par sems pa dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phros chos
276a7(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di thos nas/ byang chub sems dpyir zhing gtan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas/ yang byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
276a8(mdo sde): so so nas rang rang gi gos gyon pa lung de byang chub sems dpa' 'od 'phro gsol nas// bla na med pa mchog dam pa'i sems bskyed de/ smon lam 'di skad gsol to// ba /
276b1(mdo sde): cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab po// tshangs pa chen po dge slong de
276b2(mdo sde): dag gis bdo nams de la brten nas ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du bsgrubs nas/ bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das pa na/ 'khor ba las yongs su 'das pa'i shes pa
276b3(mdo sde): skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bskal pa grangs med pa sum bcu 'das pa'i 'go tu bla na med pa
276b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ bskal pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal zhes bya/ yul gyi ming ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar dus
276b5(mdo sde): gcig tu kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgya ste/ de dag kun kyang mtshan smon lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ yon tan gyi mtshan sum bcu yongs
276b6(mdo sde): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes lungs bstan to// gzhan yang tshangs pablo// gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di gang dag nyan pa dang // 'dzin pa de dag mthu dang gzi brje
276b7(mdo sde): chen po dang lda par 'gyur te/ dper na thabs dang mi ldan pa'i skyes bu lA lnga zhig gis pha rol du phyin pa drug bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du srung ba bas/ gang rig
276b8(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di glegs bam du bris te zla ba phyed phyed cing / sems rtse gcig
277a1(mdo sde): du byas te klog cing 'don na/ bsod rnams kyi phung po de las bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des rgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas grangs su bgrang ba dang /
277a2(mdo sde): dpes pasmin par mi bzod do// tshangs pa chen po da lta bas na khyed kyis rtag tu yid la bya zhing nan tan du sgrub pa dang / gzung zhing gagazhan dag la yang yang dag par
277a3(mdo sde): rgya cher bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar skyes bu pa'o// g.yul ngor lus dang srog
277a4(mdo sde): la mi lta ba bzhin du/ ngas kyang ger 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bzung zhing 'dzin pa dang / klog cing 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang
277a5(mdo sde): dag par ston pa la thogs pa med par gyur ro to// tshangs pa chen po/ dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du rin po che sna bdun
277a6(mdo sde): yang med par mi 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal po mi bzhugs na rin po che sna bdun yang med par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chen po de ltar de ltar de bzhin du gser 'od dam pa mdo
277a7(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i ma rgyal po 'di 'jig rten na yod kyi bar du/ bla na med pa'i chos rin po chen rnams kyang nub par mi 'gyur ro// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di nam med pa na gzhan
277a8(mdo sde): dag kyang nub par 'gyur ro// de nan lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems brtse gcig tu byas te mnyan pa dang / gzung ba ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang
277b1(mdo sde): rgya cher bshad pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang // lus dang srogs la mi ltabs ngal ba dang dub pa khyad du gsol cing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
277b2(mdo sde): spyad par bya'o ste/ bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bslob cing nan tan du bya'o// de nas tshangs pa chen po la sogs te/
277b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'khor grangs med pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po/ la sogs pa de dag thams cad
277b4(mdo sde): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha du btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
277b5(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsrungs pa dang yongs su rgyas par bgyi'o// chos ston pa'i
277b6(mdo sde): bgegs dang bar chad bsal te/ dge bar 'gyur ba dang / kha dog dang mthu stobs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar
277b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'khor rnams kyang bde ba nyam su myong ba dang / gang na gnas pa'i yul de yang mu ge dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ma yin pas 'tshe ba'i gnod pa
277b8(mdo sde): zhig mchis na yang / bdag cag lha'i 'khor gyis yongs su gsungs pas/ de dag bde zhing skyed pa dang / gnod pa rnams mi 'byung bar gyur na de dag kyang bdag can
278a1(mdo sde): lha'i mthu lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gang la la zhig mdo 'di la mchod cing rim gror bgyid na/ de la bdag cag gis sangs rgyas btso
278a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod cing ri mor bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po la sogs te tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag dang / rgyal po che/
278a3(mdo sde): po bzhi dang / gno sbyin gyi dbang lnga sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyed kyis dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di yang
278a4(mdo sde): thos/ mdo sde'i glang po 'di dang / 'di 'dzin pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i sems bskyed pa des bsod nams kyi khyad par chad med pa dang ldan pas/ myur du bla na med
278a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas
278a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid la brten nas bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
278a7(mdo sde): ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal
278a8(mdo sde): po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu dgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
278b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam
278b2(mdo sde): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
278b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i cho gas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ lha'i tshogs tham
278b4(mdo sde): cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab
278b5(mdo sde): tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can
278b6(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skyems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag
278b7(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/ mu ge'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel ba/
278b8(mdo sde): mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar 'byed pa/ gnod pa brgya stong
279a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang rgya char
279a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos mnyam pa'i chos bdud brtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi
279a3(mdo sde): byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang mthu yang bskyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjed dang dpal dang / phun sum chog
279a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag cag gis lus la 'jug par 'gyur te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/
279a5(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po/
279a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa/ snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi gzi brjed 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan
279a7(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam
279a8(mdo sde): par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar gyi'o/ bsrung bar gyi/ yongs su bskyab par yang bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'ang
279b1(mdo sde): de'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong ba zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tsho gas
279b2(mdo sde): kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i yang ba 'am/ nad kyi yang ba 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa brgya stong dag gis gces par
279b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul
279b4(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang
279b5(mdo sde): du mchis par gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya chen yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnos pa sna tshogs brgya dang /
279b6(mdo sde): gnod pa brgya stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gang dag gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i
279b7(mdo sde): dge slong chos smra ba de dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang spen par 'gyur ro// btsun bcom ldan 'das
279b8(mdo sde): nam mi'i rgyal pa des gser 'od dam pa mang sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te/ zos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol thams
280a1(mdo sde): cad las kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su bslab pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su sbyong bar bgyid pa dang / btsun
280a2(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar gyi'o// yongasu bsgrub
280a3(mdo sde): pa dang / yongasu su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhen pa dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des/
280a4(mdo sde): nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/
280a5(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
280a6(mdo sde): bde ba dang / yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam ma'i rgyal pos/ dge slong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
280a7(mdo sde): nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bsti bstang bgyid bla mar bgyid ri mor bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po
280a8(mdo sde): bzhis mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po thams cad pas chen bsti bstang du gyid/ chen bla mar bgyid/ chen ri mor bgyid/ ches mchod par bgyid ste/ yul thaMd
280b1(mdo sde): du yang ba tu bsngags par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis lha dang mi la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
280b2(mdo sde): bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// /
280b3(mdo sde): rgyal chen po dag khyed yang legs so// 'di lta ste khyed na sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
280b4(mdo sde): mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po// chos kyi lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni yun ring por
280b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa
280b6(mdo sde): bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub pa la brtson pa yin te/ rgyal chen po khyed bzhis
280b7(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / ri mor byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang /
280b8(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar shig/ des na rgyal po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang
281a1(mdo sde): bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi chu kun tu bsrungs
281a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bsrungs pa dang / yongs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po chen pa dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang
281a3(mdo sde): bcas pa khyed bzhi/ lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'bred pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i nga
281a4(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir dge slong ngam/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang
281a5(mdo sde): po 'dzin pa de dag la kun du babagyis shig/ yongs su bakhyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar
281a6(mdo sde): gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi
281a7(mdo sde): bzang ldan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus ma g.yas pa'i skangs bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal po
281a8(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gsor 'od dam pa mdo rje'i dbang po 'di
281b1(mdo sde): grong ngam/ grong khyer rab/ grong rdol lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor rab/ pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du spyo
281b2(mdo sde): sbyong par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por bar gyur pa gang la la zhig lnga'i dbang po'i dam tshig/ rgyal po'i bstan bcog 'dis/
281b3(mdo sde): po bgyid cing rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyam tam/ ri mor bgyid dam/ mchod par bgyid dam/ brjed par bgyid cid ma/
281b4(mdo sde): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti bstang bgyid/ btsun por bgyid/ ri mor
281b5(mdo sde): bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chu/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag
281b6(mdo sde): rgyal po chen pong dung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du mi'i lha'i lus 'di dag gis gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur
281b7(mdo sde): bdag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gis gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par
281b8(mdo sde): 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus bstar mi gang
282a1(mdo sde): bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong brdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od
282a2(mdo sde): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyam pa dang / ri mor
282a3(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang /
282a4(mdo sde): zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab
282a5(mdo sde): pa dang / yos su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang /
282a6(mdo sde): 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
282a7(mdo sde): bo'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra
282a8(mdo sde): zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed la/
282b1(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla mang ba nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan dag
282b2(mdo sde): dang g.yul 'gying par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi zid pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang / nad kyang lca
282b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa
282b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmigs
282b5(mdo sde): tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul du nang byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhag cig tu yul der mchi 'chil ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
282b6(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar 'chal bar 'gyur na/ bcun bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas
282b7(mdo sde): pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar gyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de g.yul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyid las
282b8(mdo sde): ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs der mchi bar yang mi
283a1(mdo sde): nus na/ phul gzhig par lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
283a2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs so// khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na
283a3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / ri mor bye ba dang / mchod pa byed pa de
283a4(mdo sde): dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
283a5(mdo sde): 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul de dag kun tu bsrungs shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzungs pa dang /
283a6(mdo sde): yongs su bskyad dang / chad pa spang ba dang / bude legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar
283a7(mdo sde): bar gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang / tshangs mi 'bru
283a8(mdo sde): ba dang / mi brtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer
283b1(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi pa stong po de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang /
283b2(mdo sde): rang gi nor gyi phungs po phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal
283b3(mdo sde): po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis/ dga' ba dang / phan yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol mi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam
283b4(mdo sde): bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun mi 'thab/ 'tshang mi 'bru/
283b5(mdo sde): mi brjod/ mi bgyid par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' ba 'gyur ro// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par
283b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang /
283b7(mdo sde): lo khyud khor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i 'dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgya skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char ba'i
283b8(mdo sde): rgyun yang sa la dus dus 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che
284a1(mdo sde): ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mam
284a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur
284a3(mdo sde): la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas cing / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
284a4(mdo sde): g+hu nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti bstang byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang
284a5(mdo sde): g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu'i klung / chos
284a6(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed kyi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// khyed kyi brtson 'gru
284a7(mdo sde): dang mthu dang stobs kyang bskyed do// byed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel lo// me'i rgyal ba des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsa
284a8(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgya chen po yangs pa bya bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma byon
284b1(mdo sde): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la yang yo byad bsam gyis ma khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod par byas
284b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang /
284b3(mdo sde): yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor 'khor
284b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
284b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde bsam gyis
284b6(mdo sde): mi khyab dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna chog myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur/ yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro//
284b7(mdo sde): gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / gnod me pa dang / 'khrug pa med 'gyur ro// 'de skad ces
284b8(mdo sde): bka'astsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lta ba chen pa rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal chen po yul 'khor bzung dang / rgyal ba can po 'phags skyes pa dang / rgyal ba
285a1(mdo sde): po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsus pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'ong dam pa
285a2(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'chal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'chal bar 'gyur/ btsun mong dam pa dang /
285a3(mdo sde): rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun me'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'chal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
285a4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'chal bar 'gyur/
285a5(mdo sde): che 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'chal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par
285a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis mchis pa yongasu 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongs su myong
285a7(mdo sde): 'chal par 'gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'gos pa ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug
285a8(mdo sde): ba ma mchis par gyid pa 'chal bar 'gyur na/ btsun bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mor dang /
285b1(mdo sde): bcam pas gas nga dam pa mang rje'i dbang pa'i rgyal po 'di la bsti bkang du 'gyis te zhan par rgyal// gapar 'ad sa ma mang sde'i dbang ba'i rnam pa 'a
285b2(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i slad du mi'i rgyal po des rgyal ba des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchis par bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos tshogs
285b3(mdo sde): kyis chag chag tu btab cing me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis leg
285b4(mdo sde): bar brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bden sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po de'i bo lus bkru
285b5(mdo sde): bar bgyis cing gos dri rab tu bda' ba/ gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba bding bar bgyis te/
285b6(mdo sde): stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// des rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang dregra pa tham
285b7(mdo sde): cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis gser 'od dam mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyam par bgyi'o// dge slong chos spras pa de yang ston par 'dus shes bskyed par
285b8(mdo sde): bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i 'dus na/ btsun mo dam ngam pa dang / rgyal po bu rnams dang / rgyal po bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams
286a1(mdo sde): sgrub bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du
286a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
286a3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
286a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkyang thub pa'i chos 'jig rten pa dang mi 'thun pa bdag mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag pa
286a5(mdo sde): rdzogs byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gi
286a6(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da lta byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro//
286a7(mdo sde): deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chang bar 'gyur/ deng bdag gis
286a8(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba thag jig 'argya stong phrag du mthob par dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis tu byin nyid kyi lum bye
286b1(mdo sde): ba khrig khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los bsdu ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya
286b2(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyuraro// deng bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du bar 'khor ba las yongasu bar par byas par 'gyur/
286b3(mdo sde): deng bdag gis bsod nas kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis khyab pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'i
286b4(mdo sde): 'khor gyis tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par yang 'gyur ro// gang gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyi ma khyab pa
286b5(mdo sde): mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med par byas par byas par 'gyur// deng bdag gis yul 'di thams cad du kun tu bsungs par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyang
286b6(mdo sde): ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyid dmigs tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyuraro//
286b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal ba chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge phra la 'am/ dge blo snyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin
286b8(mdo sde): pa bdag la mi'i rgyal po'i dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus bsti bstang bye/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed// chod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung
287a1(mdo sde): dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po
287a2(mdo sde): de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis khyad pa des rnam
287a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyis
287a4(mdo sde): kyang brgyan par 'gyuraro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas shin du tshar chod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
287a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos
287a6(mdo sde): la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di
287a7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti bskang bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing / rgyal po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid
287a8(mdo sde): spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa pa de nyan cing / bdag cag dang lha
287b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ngo gas cung zad cig sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i rgyal
287b2(mdo sde): ze des/ bdag cag rgyal po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos sna tshogs kyi bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
287b3(mdo sde): 'di la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdug ma thag tu/ spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad
287b4(mdo sde): cig yud tsam de la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing dag gi gdugs rnams su
287b5(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgyal chen po yang snum par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang bdag cag gi khang pa rnams
287b6(mdo sde): kyang snang bar gyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing dag skad cig yud tsam de la mi 'jid kyi bdag po tshangs
287b7(mdo sde): pa dang / lha rnam kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / sa'i lha mo bstan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin
287b8(mdo sde): gyis sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nur bu bzang po dang /
288a1(mdo sde): 'argyal po mchis pa dang /
288a2(mdo sde): 'grags sas bcu'i lang dang bcas pa dang / chu'i rgyal ba rgyal tsha dang / klu'i rgyal ba gzha dag ga nga ga/
288a3(mdo sde): sdang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri gda' ba sna tshogs rgya chen po yang sbam par 'gyur// rang pa rnams kyi
288a4(mdo sde): nang du gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang de dag rnams kyi gnas thams cad snang ba bgyis par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa
288a5(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi gleng gi bar snang
288a6(mdo sde): la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam
288a7(mdo sde): ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la rtsod pa'i phyir/ thos sna tshogs de dag gdugs ma bag tu de lag na thos por cig thogs pa des las grom dang bdug pa sngam tshogs
288a8(mdo sde): kyi 'jim shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gang cig zang cig sung tsam de la/ snang gsum kyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'di thams cad na/ gang na zlab
288a9(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang khor yug
288b1(mdo sde): chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po che bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa
288b2(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar son pa'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du
288b3(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang / klung dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
288b4(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po'i chogs rnams rang rang gi gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/
288b5(mdo sde): spos dri rgya chen po yang snum par 'gyur lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar yang 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas
288b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa
288b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal
288b8(mdo sde): po des spos sna tshogs sgo de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ gsar 'ang dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus// spos dang bdug pa sna tshog
289a1(mdo sde): kyi 'khril shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang+ga'i klung
289a2(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyen dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gi'i klung bye ma snyed kyi bar snang la/
289a3(mdo sde): spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur te de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs rgya
289a4(mdo sde): che zhing dri shin tu rgya che ba smras par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba dze byo jo bo che 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya
289a5(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma gad+hI klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul chen po de dag byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig
289a6(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gla chos smra ba de dgongs par mdzad par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam
289a7(mdo sde): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu/ 'di rgya cher
289a8(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu 'chang bar 'dod pa khyed yang legs so legs so// zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// su ba na gser 'do pa pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
289b1(mdo sde): nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor
289b2(mdo sde): la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta ci smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di zos ma zag tu byang chub sems dpa'
289b3(mdo sde): stes bu da
289b4(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
289b5(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na bzhugs pa
289b6(mdo sde): ngag gis de'i tshe de'i 'dus na/ tshig mthun pa dang ngag 'thun pa dang / sgra skad mthun pas dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri bstan la 'dug pa de lta 'di skad ces bka
289b7(mdo sde): stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i 'dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/
289b8(mdo sde): shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhug
289b9(mdo sde): dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dka' ba spyod pa byed pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyung / skyes bu dam/
290a1(mdo sde): pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams pang
290a2(mdo sde): yongs su slob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa
290a3(mdo sde): mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam po khyod byang chub snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
290a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med pa rab tu zhi ba rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan
290a5(mdo sde): snying po gan+d+ha pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa/ rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu bsko
290a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa brdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos dang bla na med pa 'bung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos
290a7(mdo sde): kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi smon pa bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes rnam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'be
290a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra brgya stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin
290b1(mdo sde): tu 'jig su rung ba'i 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las
290b2(mdo sde): yongs su bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
290b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhin po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
290b4(mdo sde): yon tan tshe 'di dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung 'di lta bu dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma
290b5(mdo sde): mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas/ snying bya'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod
290b6(mdo sde): sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing dag gis bdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis
290b7(mdo sde): to/ mi'i rgyal po de khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos char sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna
290b8(mdo sde): tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i bro brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
291a1(mdo sde): lha mo chen po dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo bstan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon po yang dag shes pa dang /
291a2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi sde dbod chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon blo lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor
291a3(mdo sde): bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma gros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag
291a4(mdo sde): lus mi gda' bar gyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de chos kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i
291a5(mdo sde): sa bshams par gyur pa ga la ba der mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/
291a6(mdo sde): gnod sprin brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa/ chos
291a7(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma zag tu mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su sgrub pa dang //
291a8(mdo sde): yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho zang de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yu
291b1(mdo sde): de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongasu sgrub pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
291b2(mdo sde): chad pa spang bar bgyi'o// yul de yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yos su thar bar bgyi'o// btsun bcom ldan
291b3(mdo sde): 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
291b4(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po de/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la/ bsti bstang
291b5(mdo sde): mi bgyid/ ri mor mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ ri mor mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya
291b6(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma dag chos nyan dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyidado// ri mor mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjed
291b7(mdo sde): yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / bstobs kyang mi bskyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang /
291b8(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'bel bar mi bgyid lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / g.yog tu bcas pa dang /
292a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis ni/ yul de yal bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis
292a2(mdo sde): yul de yul de yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'gyur ro// btsun bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis
292a3(mdo sde): yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas
292a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams kyang / 'ab pa bskye ba dang / 'chang 'bru ba skye ba dang / brtsod pa bskye bar 'gyur/ dogs pa dang / 'gyid par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang //
292a5(mdo sde): nad rnam pa sna tshogs rnams yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa dag nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun pa
292a6(mdo sde): gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur brda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi mi'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba na mkha' la
292a7(mdo sde): gnas par yang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su na mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil par 'gyur/ se la gnas pa'i khron
292a8(mdo sde): pa yang sgra 'byin pa grag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i yang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs kyis yul
292b1(mdo sde): 'dzem par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// btsun bcom
292b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag rgya lo bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / yul na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu rnams kyis yul
292b3(mdo sde): de yal bar bor nas/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la
292b4(mdo sde): zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de dag nyid la bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'chal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong 'tshal bar 'gyur//
292b5(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar
292b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par gyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad yun ring du skyong 'chal bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid
292b7(mdo sde): bgyid ma 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyid 'tshal
292b8(mdo sde): bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des/ gdon mi 'chal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyid mnyan par bgyi/
293a1(mdo sde): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti bstang bgyi/ ri mor
293a2(mdo sde): bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal la po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang // chos
293a3(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom
293a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang
293a5(mdo sde): pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnams pa sna tshogs ji snyed bsten padag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bstan bcos rnam pa
293a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam par sna tshogs dag gis sems can gyi don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
293a7(mdo sde): 'das pa'i brten bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
293a8(mdo sde): ni/ btsun bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / drang song mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag
293b1(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang / bde bar gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slang du rgya cher yang dag par
293b2(mdo sde): bshad pa lags so// ci nas 'jim bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po de nyid bde bar bgyi ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad
293b3(mdo sde): bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang gi yul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad no gnod pa dang / dgra
293b4(mdo sde): ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul de dag na nad 'gos pa ma mchis shing 'khrug
293b5(mdo sde): pa mchis par 'gyur ba dang / cis nas yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang
293b6(mdo sde): gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma mchen po 'bar bar bgyi zhing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis
293b7(mdo sde): gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas
293b8(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad mye ba dang / ri mor bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjed po chen pos rnam par 'phel bar/
294a1(mdo sde): 'ba' bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /
294a2(mdo sde): ci nas bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'jam bu'i gling thams cad lo legs
294a3(mdo sde): shing nyams dga' la skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga'
294a4(mdo sde): ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing shin tu rgya che bdag
294a5(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
294a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de thams cad de lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
294a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig
294a8(mdo sde): rgya stong dag gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs
294b1(mdo sde): kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcos pa yang dag
294b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis sems cad thams cad kyi don gyi slad du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par
294b3(mdo sde): rab tu bshad do// mi'i rgyal po'i dgongs pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang /
