367a6(mdo sde): / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
367a7(mdo sde): ba'i rdzum pa 'as bya ba theg pargyan pa'amang rdzags // sa kyis thags ke tsa
367a8(mdo sde): te Shany+tsa yo ni rod+ha e thai bA ti ma hA shra ma NaHoM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra ye swA hA/ dge'o// sarba mang+ga ga
368a1(mdo sde): gser 'od ngam chung bzhugs s+ho// bkra shis//
368b1(mdo sde): rgyu ba rgyu sasu smyo su
368b2(mdo sde): d+hUR+YA bus d+ha sa nA m+b+haH/ da / lag dgas da dpa mad kyi
368b3(mdo sde): rgya mi zhes bya ba zhig pa na meng/ dag/ 'das pa dang /
368b4(mdo sde): padang / dar byung ba'i sangs rgyab dang / byang chub sems dang dang / ra so/
368b5(mdo sde): dang / 'phags pa nyan pothos sems cad la phyog 'tshal lo// 'di na bdag gas
369a1(mdo sde): pa dus gcig na/ bya rgod phung po'i chos kyi dbyings/ zab mo sangs rgyas
369a2(mdo sde): spyod yul na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni// dag cing rdul rnams med pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa
369a3(mdo sde): mchog rnams la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po ste// gton na shin tu zab pa dang // yongasu brtags na zab
369a4(mdo sde): pa nyid// gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ byin gyis brlabs kyis
369a5(mdo sde): byin rlabs pa/ mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su// rin chen tog gi lho phyogs su// 'od dpag med ni nub phyogasu/
369a6(mdo sde): rnga sgra yi ni byang phyogasu// sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa/ sdig pa'i las
369b1(mdo sde): rnams zad byed pa// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ga ni/
369b2(mdo sde): dpal kun gyis ni legs brgyan pa// byin gyis brlabs de brjod par bya// sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang
369b3(mdo sde): nyams dang // phan tshun mi thun gang chags dang // lha rnams skyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mthu sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // bram ze la sog
369b4(mdo sde): gtses pa dang // phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin dang // nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang // gza'
369b5(mdo sde): dang rgyu skar byung sde mas dang // mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan mngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na
369b6(mdo sde): yang // de ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yi dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang
370a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis rab brgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo sde nyan par byed na ni// mdo
370a2(mdo sde): sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa dag/ shin du mi zad 'di 'dra ba// de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten
370a3(mdo sde): skyong ba bdag nyi dang // blon po'i tshigs kyis dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis// de dag la ni bsrung bar byed/
370a4(mdo sde): lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // na ra dza rar gnas pa dang // 'byung po ma mo 'phrog ma dang // sa'i lha mo btan ma dang // tshangs
370a5(mdo sde): pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni// mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang
370a6(mdo sde): rnams// sde dang stobs dang gzhon pa dang // bcas te de dag der lhags nas// nyin dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar// de dag la ni bsrung /
370b1(mdo sde): bar byed// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed pa dka'// mdo 'di rab tu bshad
370b2(mdo sde): par bya// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang // gang dag 'di la zos byed dang // gang su rjes su yid rang dang // gang dag mchod par byed pa rnam/
370b3(mdo sde): de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi'am ci dag dang // lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur// srog chags
370b4(mdo sde): bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur/
370b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mo spyod pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu bzung bar
370b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin// gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos pa// dri zhim pa yis gos 'cha shing // byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas/
371a1(mdo sde): g.yel ba med par mchod par bya// rang gi sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang rab tu dang
371a2(mdo sde): byed kyis// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis// gang dag mod 'di mnyan pa ni// de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs// mi'i srid pa legs par thob//
371a3(mdo sde): 'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur// de dag gang ba'i bu gar yang // bshad pa 'di 'dra drag 'gyur ba// de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas mang
371a4(mdo sde): pos rab tu sngags// gser 'od dam pa mchog mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang pa'o// // yang de'i tshe dus na rgyal
371a5(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba// sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas
371a6(mdo sde): pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te// rgyu dang
371b1(mdo sde): rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste// lo brgyad bcu zhig thub ste 'di ltar sku che thung snyam te/ de yang 'di snyam du sems nas/ bcom ldan 'das
371b2(mdo sde): kyis kyang / 'di skad du rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur ste/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'i zhes
371b3(mdo sde): gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa nas/ srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pas na/ dge bcu'i
371b4(mdo sde): las kyi lam gyi bar du yang dag blangs te gnas par 'gyur/ zas kyang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang ste/ than rang gi lus
371b5(mdo sde): kyi sha dang khrags rus dang / rkang gis kyang sems can stogs pa rnams tshis par mdzad nas/ zas gzhan gyi lta ci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes
371b6(mdo sde): bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las/ 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che ba /
371b7(mdo sde): dur+ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // lha las 'das pa'i
371b8(mdo sde): spos kyi khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhinas lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khri de las kyang lha'i ras
372a1(mdo sde): bcos bu rin po che'i phrug rnams gting ba dag byung bar gyur to// khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad ma rin po che du mas spras pa/
372a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // pad ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs
372a3(mdo sde): pa mi 'khrugs pa byung bar gyur/ lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung / nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med byung / byang phyogs nas
372a4(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/ seng ge'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba chen
372a5(mdo sde): pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun du 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi khams dag
372a6(mdo sde): snang bas khyab par gyur to// lha'i me tog gi char pab lha'i sil snyan dag gi sgra byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir seMs
372a7(mdo sde): can thams cad lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad ldan par gyur/ sems can dmus long dag ni mig gi
372a8(mdo sde): gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can ston pa dag ni dran pa sa sor rnyed/ sems can g.yeng ba dag ni mi g.yeng bar/
372b1(mdo sde): gyur/ sems can sman mo rnams ni gos bgos par gyur/ sems can skyes pa dag ni lto 'drangs par gyur/ sems can skom pa dag ni skom dang ldan par gyur to// sems can nad
372b2(mdo sde): kyi btab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur to// 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher 'byung
372b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te de tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing
372b4(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
372b5(mdo sde): ngag rnams rjes su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
372b6(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad bcu zhig thub sde sku tshe thung ba 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dgongs nas
372b7(mdo sde): mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa sku che thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig/
372b8(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma togs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa
373a1(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das
373a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du yang rtogs par nus pa nged kyi su yang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin
373a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad mchod par brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang gnod sbyin
373a4(mdo sde): dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus te/ byang chub sems
373a5(mdo sde): dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim du lhags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa
373a6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho chu rnams thams cad kyi/ thigs pa ngag ni bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// ri
373a7(mdo sde): rab rnams ni thams cad kyang / phra rabs rdul du bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// sa la gang dag yod pa yis// rab tu phra rdul ji
373a8(mdo sde): snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar dus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i ched mi nus/ gal te la las namakha' la// sna 'ga' zhig gi dpag 'dod dang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/
373b1(mdo sde): sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs// bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ skal pa bye ba brgyad dag ces// grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo //
373b2(mdo sde): gar phyir de'i rgyu gnyis ni// rgyu dang rkyen dag rnam gnyis te// sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spangs pa dang / kha zas mang po byin pa ste// de phyir bdag nyid chen po de'i// sku tshe'i grangs ni mi rnyed te/
373b3(mdo sde): bskal pa 'di nyid cig ci'am// grangs med pa yang de bzhin te// de bas the tshom med par 'gyur// the tshom cung zad ma za cig/ rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tha ma ni// grangs ni gang du yang mi
373b4(mdo sde): dmigs so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u 'di n+ya zhes bya ba dang // bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs/
373b5(mdo sde): pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas/ phral la dus te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa gal te bcom ldan 'das
373b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la pha lta bu mi mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bur snang mdzad pa/ shes rab dang ye
373b7(mdo sde): shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing // gal te khyod sems can thams cad sgra can zin bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam pa cig stsal du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
373b8(mdo sde): cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyi mthong na/ dga' ba zhes bya ba ste spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon
374a1(mdo sde): lung bston pa bram ze ko'u 'di n+ya zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so// ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa cig gsol lam/
374a2(mdo sde): bdag gis khyod la dam pa cig sbyin no// bram zes smras pa li tsa byi gzhon nu/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / ring srel gyi phye ma dgos pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
374a3(mdo sde): ring srel yungs 'bru tsam la sten par 'dod do// ring srel yung 'bru tsam de mchod na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po 'ga' zhig thob ces grag go/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu gser 'do
374a4(mdo sde): dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi shes par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dag dang ldan pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo bshad ces grag gi nyon cig/
374a5(mdo sde): kye li tsa byi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'di ni/ de ltar shes par dka' bas na kho bo cag 'tha' khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni gang brtsangs na sems can rnams myur du sum
374a6(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag bro thob par 'gyur ba'i ring srel yung 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo // li tsa byi gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa
374a7(mdo sde): las ring srel yung 'bru tsam gsol/ za ma tog tu bcug te btsangs pas sems can rnams sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye li tsa byi
374a8(mdo sde): gzhon du kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas li tsa byi gzhon du sems can thams cad kyi mthong na dga' bas slob dpon lung bstan pa bram ze ko'u 'di rgyal
374b1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar smras pa/ nam zhig gang ga'i chu rgyun las/ me tog rnam ni skye ba dang // bya rog dmar por gyur pa dang / khu byug dung mdog ltar
374b2(mdo sde): gyur dang // 'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags dang // 'bra gor a sgra'i dog pa chags// de'i dus na yung 'bru tsam// ring srel du ni gsal bar bya// nam zhig rus sbal spu rnams las
374b3(mdo sde): gos su legs par btags gyur te// rgun gyi grang ba srel byed pa/ de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sbrang bu rka lag las// yang thog legs par byas gyur te// brtan
374b4(mdo sde): zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba// de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu pad ma kun// so ni dkar po skyes gyur te// rno zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur/
374b5(mdo sde): mtho ris su ni mdzeg pa'i phyir// nam zhig ri bong ra rnams las// sgras ni legs par byas gyur pa// de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sgras ni der 'jigs te// byi
374b6(mdo sde): bas zla ba za ba dang // sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yi// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te/ khyim na
374b7(mdo sde): gnas par byed gyur pa// de tshe ring srel yod par gyur// nam zhig bong bu byed gyur la// chu dmar bim pa 'dra gyur cig/ glu gar rnams mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring srel
374b8(mdo sde): yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// dben par dong nas brtse ba dang // phan tshun 'thun par gyur pa na// de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur// pa la sha'i lo
376a1(mdo sde): ma rnams// rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te// char ba bskyabs su nam gyur pa// de che ring srel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig
376a2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor g.yog mor bcas pa na// thang la phyung ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis// ri bo spos kyi
376a3(mdo sde): ngang ldan pa// chu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u 'di n+yas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas// li tsa byi
376a4(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyi mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa// legs so legs gzhon nu mchog/ rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che// dpa'
376a5(mdo sde): zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa// lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab go rim bzhin// gzhon
376a6(mdo sde): nus bdag la mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi// sangs rgyas thams cad
376a7(mdo sde): yang dag 'byung // sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das ni bcos ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyed te//
376a8(mdo sde): rdo rje lta bur za ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad/ drang srong chen po'i ring sral ni// lung 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med// sku la rus pa khrag med na// ring srel yod par
376b1(mdo sde): ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyi ring srel gzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
376b2(mdo sde): dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra// bdag gi 'di thos shes nas ni// bdag gi dam pa gsol bar byas// de nyid kho na lung
376b3(mdo sde): bstan phyir// gtam gling ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri drug stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo bkas bshad pa thos nas/
376b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// de dag yid kyi rtog pa rab tu dga' nas/ sgra dbyangs cig tu tshigs su bcad pa
376b5(mdo sde): 'di dag smra so// sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyi/ yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston//
376b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas
376b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang // skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku
376b8(mdo sde): tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas// tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste// dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen pos khyab
377a1(mdo sde): par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe// sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla
377a2(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
377a3(mdo sde): rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid
377a4(mdo sde): kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun du snang ba 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // phyogs thams cad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
377a5(mdo sde): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na rin po che bai dur+ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing / 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyi ltas nas
377a6(mdo sde): chos ston pa mthong ngo // de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rnga de rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las ston pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos
377a7(mdo sde): so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sad ma thag tu bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rjes su dran no// rjes su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zang pa
377a8(mdo sde): dang // rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste// srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
377b1(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
377b2(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rmi lam na rnga'i sgra las
377b3(mdo sde): bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsol to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// /
377b4(mdo sde): nub cig g.yel ba med par yang // bdag gi rmi lam gyur pa ni// mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong bas ste// thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// ji ltar nyi ma bzhin du 'bar/ kun
377b5(mdo sde): du rnam par lha de ste// phyogs bcu dag na snang gyur te// kun tu rin chen shing drung na// rin chen bai dUr+ya dag gi/ khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs to// brgya stong phra ni du ma
377b6(mdo sde): yi// 'khod dbus mdun gyi ltas pa mthong // bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig/ rnga chen rab tu rdung ba mthong // de yis de las brdungs pa dang // tshigs su bcad
377b7(mdo sde): pa 'di dag mthong // gser 'od dam pa rnga chen sgra yis ni// stong gsum 'jig rten gsum dag/ ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i
377b8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhi bar shog/ rnga bo che'i sgra skad 'di yis ni// 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad ni gyur cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar/
378a1(mdo sde): sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i
378a2(mdo sde): yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// skyes dgu'i ting 'dzin yan lag gis// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur// rnga bo che yi rnga skad 'di yis ni//
378a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa mchog reg shog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor gyur cig/ skal pa bsam
378a4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab bzhugs gyur cig/ 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur
378a5(mdo sde): cig/ sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te// rus pa'i lus la mi lce rab 'bar ba// de dag rnga chen sngags pa thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal/
378a6(mdo sde): lo zhes tshigs thos shog/ sems can kun gyi skye ba brgya dag dang // skye ba stong phrag bye ba skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de dag gis ni rgya
378a7(mdo sde): chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo che'i rnga skad 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag du 'grogs rnyed 'gyur// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog/ bya ba
378a8(mdo sde): dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srong chags thams cad kyis// de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa// rnga'o che yi rnga skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams
378b1(mdo sde): kyis de kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzang ba skyes// lus la me lce kun du rab tu 'bar// bskyabs med mya ngan bcas shing kun du khyam/
378b2(mdo sde): me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi'i 'jig rten na// sems can mi bzang sdug bsngal// rnga bo che yi rnga skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi
378b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal kun zhi shog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang // bskyabs med par ni gyur pa dang // de rnams las ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur/
378b4(mdo sde): cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag/ thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs// gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol//
378b5(mdo sde): bdag gi sngon chad sdig pa'i las// shin du mi bzang gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par gyis// pha ma dag
378b6(mdo sde): du mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang // sdig pa bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // phyug po'i rgyags pa dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spyod
378b7(mdo sde): bkyegs pa dang // gzhon pa'i skyegs pas dregs pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang // nyes par bgyis pa'i
378b8(mdo sde): las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigs sum ltas dang // bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // byis pa'i blo yis 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun pa'i sems dang /
379a1(mdo sde): ni// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang // nyon mongs rnams par 'khrug pa'i sems// rtsed mo dga' ba'i dang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni
379a2(mdo sde): nad dbang dang // nor gyis mi chog nyen pa yi// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang // phra dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i
379a3(mdo sde): nyes pa yis// bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyis dang // phongs pa byung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams kyi 'jig rgyu dang // phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang
379a4(mdo sde): bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // 'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang // bkres dang skom gyis nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // gza'
379a5(mdo sde): ba dag dang btung ba yi// bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig/ nyes
379a6(mdo sde): par spyad pa rnam gsum rtsegs// 'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos
379a7(mdo sde): rnams la ni// gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis dang // chos
379a8(mdo sde): la'ang gus par ma bgyis dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la ma
379b1(mdo sde): gus dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// blun po dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nga rgyal dregs pas sgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams
379b2(mdo sde): cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// stobs bcu rnams la mchod par shog/ bdag ni phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sdug bsngal kun
379b3(mdo sde): las 'don gyur cig/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu dag la 'god par shog/ sa bcu dag la gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur
379b4(mdo sde): cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la// de kun thar bgyid nus srid du// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal pa bye bar spyod par shog/ gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba
379b5(mdo sde): las rnams thams cad byang byed pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can dag ston gyur cig/ gang gi skal pa stong rnams su// sdig pa shin du mi bzad bgyis//
379b6(mdo sde): lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge
379b7(mdo sde): ba yis// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas phyogs bcu po// sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi//
379b8(mdo sde): srid pa'i mtsho las sbal bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho za ba mo de// sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyi// thams cad mkhyen du
380a1(mdo sde): rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams su// gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang thob byang chub yan
380a2(mdo sde): lag gis// stobs bcu dam par gyur par bgyid// dgongs pa'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol// thugs rje ldan pa'i
380a3(mdo sde): thugs kyi ni// nongs pa rab tu bzung du gsol// bdag gis skal pa brgya rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir byadag ni mya ngan sems// phongs
380a4(mdo sde): pa mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir// sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur// gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du'ang
380a5(mdo sde): dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas rgyas thams cad thugs rje ldan// 'gro ba kun gyis 'jigs sel bas// nongs pa rab tu bzung du gsol// 'jigs pa
380a6(mdo sde): dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gis nyon mongs las rnams kyis// dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag po ni// snying po chu
380a7(mdo sde): yis bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang // da ltar bdag gis sdig pa gang // de dag
380a8(mdo sde): thams cad bdag 'chags so// nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// slan chad mi bgyi gdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang // sdig de/
380b1(mdo sde): cab par mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnams gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnams pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag
380b2(mdo sde): 'chags so// lus kyi bgyis dang ngag gis las// yid kyi rnams par bsam pa dang // las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// /
380b3(mdo sde): mi dge'i las bcu spangs nas su// dge ba bcu po sten bgyis dang // sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gi/
380b4(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam bu'i
380b5(mdo sde): gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yid rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid
380b6(mdo sde): kyis kyang // bdag gis sod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi// srid 'gror nyam nga byis pa'i
380b7(mdo sde): blo yis ni// shin du mi bzang sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de dag so sor bshags// skye ba nyam pa
380b8(mdo sde): srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga dag/ lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gi sdig gang bsags pa de 'chag so//
380b9(mdo sde): byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang 'phrad pa nyam nga dang // srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang nyam nga gti mug
381a1(mdo sde): nyam nga dang // ngal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang // bsod nams bsgrubs pa'i nyam nga dag gis kyang // rgyal mi mnyam mngon
381a2(mdo sde): sum mchis pa ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mdog ri gnang ri rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo//
381a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba de dag rnams la bskyabs su mchi// rgyal de dag rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa gser gyi 'od// dri med rnam
381a4(mdo sde): dag bai dur+ya'i yan lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzigs grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal// yan lag
381a5(mdo sde): rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dra khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la// thub pa zla ba'i
381a6(mdo sde): 'od zer 'dra bas tshim mdzad pa// mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis kyi dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe byad bzang po dag gis dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpal
381a7(mdo sde): gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer 'dra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri med kha dog sna tshogs bai dur+ya// skye rengs dmar dang /
381a8(mdo sde): shel bzhin kha dog dmar// 'od zer 'dra ba sna tshogs legs brgyan pas// thub chen khyod ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin de yis mdzes// mya ngan 'khrug pa'i 'chi chu dag pa'i rba rlabs
381b1(mdo sde): can// 'khor ba'i grungs chen phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho shin du rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po dag gis skems/
381b2(mdo sde): yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnam spras pa// sangs rgyas gser sku
381b3(mdo sde): 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni myed dang // ji ltar sa las sa rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab rngo mtha' mtshung med dang / ji ltar mkha' mtha'
381b4(mdo sde): yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyi shes par mi nus so// bskal pa du ma gzhal cing bsam kyang ni// yon tan tha ma shes
381b5(mdo sde): par mi nus so// chu ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa na// skal par bgrangs med shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas
381b6(mdo sde): yon tan pha mtha' shes mi nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku las dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan
381b7(mdo sde): pa yis// sems can thams cad 'drar gyur par shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// 'gro
381b8(mdo sde): la phan phyir chos kyang ston par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar bar gyi// stobs bcas sde btsasabadud las thar par bgyi// chos kyi
383a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar bgyi// skal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par bgyi// bdud rtsi'i chu yi tshim par bgyi// ji
383a2(mdo sde): ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba'i rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par bgyi// nyon mongs bcom zhing sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang
383a3(mdo sde): gti mug zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi// thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran par bgyi// de yi gsung ni rgya cher mos par
383a4(mdo sde): bgyi// bdan ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi// bsdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung
383a5(mdo sde): gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhir gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan
383a6(mdo sde): lag nyams// de kun de'u re dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyams chung lus nyams dang // phyog bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nad
383a7(mdo sde): las thar gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun dgra sdig gsang thug dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yi phongs
383a8(mdo sde): gyur pa// sems can nyams zag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jig mchog ma bzang brgyad las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdeg shing bcings gzir pa/
383b1(mdo sde): phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing / nyon mongs stong phrag du mas klubs nas kyang // 'jigs pa mi bzang mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de dag thams cad bcing
383b2(mdo sde): las grol gyur cig/ brdeg pa dag ni brdeg las thar gyur cig/ gsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ phongs pa thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog/
383b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad skyes sred skom gyis gzir// de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig/ 'on pas
383b4(mdo sde): yid 'od sgra rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur// sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs
383b5(mdo sde): mang po yi// sems can thams cad bde ba ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur// sems can thams cad lha na sdug pa dang // gzugs
383b6(mdo sde): bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag/ bsams pa thag tu de dag grub
383b7(mdo sde): gyur cig/ rdza rnga cang ti pa'i wang skran mas dang // chu mig mtshe'u rdzing bu lteng ka dag/ gser gyi pad ma ud pa la 'dab ma can// zas skom gos nor mu tig nor
383b8(mdo sde): bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai dUr+ya// de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma 'byung / sems can cig
384a1(mdo sde): kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur// de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'ong byed gyur par shog/ mi'i 'jig
384a2(mdo sde): rten phun sum tshogs kyang yod// de yang bsams pa skye ba de dag gyur// bsam pa thams cad bsam ma thag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bu yongasu rdzogs
384a3(mdo sde): par shog/ spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag/ ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sems can de dag lan
384a4(mdo sde): cig dgar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsam yas thams cad dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul bral dri med brten pa'i chos la
384a5(mdo sde): yang // phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba smra ba thams cad spong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ dal ba'i rgyal po dam
384a6(mdo sde): pa thob par gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs par thob par shog/ rtag tu 'thon po'i rigs su skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru'i mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig
384a7(mdo sde): snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas
384a8(mdo sde): shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dag ni rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas
384b1(mdo sde): de bzhugs rin chen bai dUr+ya'i/ khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog/ bdag gi sdig pa'i las rnam bsgrubs pa ni/
384b2(mdo sde): srid pa nyams ngar sngan chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad ma lus zad cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bcings
384b3(mdo sde): nas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags pas dam bcings pa// shes rab ral gris bcings pa dkrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal myur du thar gyur cig/ sems can gang dag
384b4(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang // gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams ni// bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa// de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo // /
384b5(mdo sde): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yi// bdag gis rjes su yid rang bsod nams nges// bdag gi smon grub 'bras bu yod par shog/ byang chub rdul bral bla/
384b6(mdo sde): med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtog dang dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyi phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongasu bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yi ni// bskal pa drag
384b7(mdo sde): bcur ngan song spong bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rig las// thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang
384b8(mdo sde): bstod pa// tshe rabs kun du skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyi yang dag brgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan//
385a1(mdo sde): mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag kun gyis de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu khar bshags pa 'di ni//
385a2(mdo sde): drag 'gyur ba// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gnas nas dge rtsa byas ma yin// gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min// de ltar sangs rgyas
385a3(mdo sde): stong gi gnas nas dge ba byas ma yin// // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// bshags pa'i lo'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
385a4(mdo sde): / bam po gnyis pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag bsdus pa la 'di
385a5(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// rig kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gser gyi lag pa zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad mo'i 'byung gnas
385a6(mdo sde): 'dis// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba gang dag sngar gyur 'das pa dang /
385a7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang zhi zhing rab
385a8(mdo sde): zhi rnam par dag/ sku ni gser gyi mdog du rab tu gda'// dbyangs rnams kun pas sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrags pa gsung /
385b1(mdo sde): bung ba rma bya ud pa la sngon po'i dbu// mthon thing lcang lo bya ni rtsa sha 'dra// kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems rtag tu gsor ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'//
385b2(mdo sde): spyan ni ring zhing 'thon zing dri ma med// ud pa la sngon po rgyas pa 'dra// ljags ni che zhing legs pad ma'i mdog/ pad ma ltar snang pad ma'i ze ba 'dra// zhal gyi
385b3(mdo sde): mdzod spu pad rtsa dung dang 'dra// bai dUr+ya'i mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil// thub pa'i zhal ni zla ba zad pa 'dra// sku'i lte ba bung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhal mtho
385b4(mdo sde): shangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste// 'jam zhing sa la'i gser ltar kha dog bzang // rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba thams cad kyis// ro mchog ldan zhing dam pa'i mchog rab
385b5(mdo sde): 'phags// spu'i bu ga nas ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// 'thon zing 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can// rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar
385b6(mdo sde): sngo la mdzes// lham ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas
385b7(mdo sde): zhing // bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems dmyal 'gro dang ni dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang // yi dgas lha nas mi'i 'gro rnams su// sems
385b8(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad bde bas tshig/ ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi// kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// gtso ma'i gser ltar rab tu
386a1(mdo sde): snang ba'i sku// bde gshegs zla ba dang pa dri med zhal// 'dzum zhing rnams mdzes shin du dri med zhal// gzhon nu btsas 'dra sku
386a2(mdo sde): lus yan lag gam// seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring bas ste// sa la'i lcags ma rlung gi bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom
386a3(mdo sde): gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong // nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhang nge ba// thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dri ma med// zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab
386a4(mdo sde): tu snang // sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhang nge ba// zhing rnams mtha' yas rgya stong rnamasu yang // mtshan phyed zla ba nyi ma mang po dag/ de dag thams cad 'od ni med par
386a5(mdo sde): gyur// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'jig rten sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs
386a6(mdo sde): pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong // bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i bya//
386a7(mdo sde): phyag dang zhabs 'os rab mdzes dri ma med// sa'i steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra ste// phra ba rdul rnyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul
386a8(mdo sde): rnyed byung ba dang // gang dag phra ma'i rdul rnyed bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba de dag la ni rab tu dang ba yi// ngag yid lus kyi me tog dbul ba dang // spos
386b1(mdo sde): rnams dbul dang sngags pa brgya dag dang // dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dger gyur pa// snying po mchog rab
386b2(mdo sde): sna tshogs du mas te// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yi// sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus so// rgyal ba cig gis yon tan rnams kyang ni//
386b3(mdo sde): lce stong gis kyang zad par brjod mi nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi// yon tan cig rgyas brjod par ga la nus// lhar bcas 'jig rten
386b4(mdo sde): thams cad mchod gyur te// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba// skra'i rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan cig la min//
386b5(mdo sde): lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yi// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis sngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod ni mas 'bras bu mchod bsags gang // des
386b6(mdo sde): ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas// rgyal pos smon lam 'di ltar 'debs pa yi// ma 'ongs bskal pa
386b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas rnamasu yang // gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba ni// rmi lam du ni 'di 'dri' rnga ltas shi/ der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra mnyan par gyis// rgyal
386b8(mdo sde): bstod pad ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba// skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang // gang dag bskal pa stong du rnyed
387a1(mdo sde): dka' ga/ de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi// nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar
387a2(mdo sde): bar bgyi// pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// phyin nas byang chub bla med thob par bgyi// bdag gi zhing ni lhod pa med gyur cig/ rnga phul rnam par smin
387a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang sngon du lta bar bgyi// der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig/ gser
387a4(mdo sde): gyi lag pa'i dbang po gser gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'u gang yin 'di gnyis kyang // der ni bu pho de dag gcig dang gnyis ka dang // byang chub bla med lung bstan
387a5(mdo sde): thob par shog/ sems can gang dag gnas med sten med cing // skyabs dang bral nas phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams las// skyobs
387a6(mdo sde): dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ rnam pa de dag srid pa ji srid
387a7(mdo sde): pa// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par gyi// gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa yi// bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gis nyon mongs
387a8(mdo sde): rgya mtsho zad par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon
387b1(mdo sde): tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog/ byang chub yon tan rin chen rdzogs par shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod
387b2(mdo sde): nams rab tu snang bar shog/ bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur// ye shes snang ba dri med dam pa yi// bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog
387b3(mdo sde): bsod nams snang ba lhag gir bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug
387b4(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde ba kun gyi mtsho 'dra ba yi// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// 'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar
387b5(mdo sde): ji snyed gshegs// de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi bdag gi zhing // /
387b6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar gyur par shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa/ ma'i 'byung
387b7(mdo sde): gnas shes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// bsam gyis mi khyab
387b8(mdo sde): mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'di// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa
388a1(mdo sde): yis// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam
388a2(mdo sde): pa 'di// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa yin// sems can kun gyi ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung ba'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs
388a3(mdo sde): dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmag dang
388a4(mdo sde): chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong cig gnas mod kyis// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna bI
388a5(mdo sde): dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna'i dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce'i dbang po rtag tu rol rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi
388a6(mdo sde): dbang pos chos rnams rnam pa spyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phyin tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni rgyu ma bzhin du g.yo ba
388a7(mdo sde): yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam spyod de// ji ltar mi shig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sem
388a8(mdo sde): ni yul drug gnas bcas bzhin// dbang po spyod yul dag yang rab shes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul
388b1(mdo sde): rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems can rnams ni dbang drug thams cad la// dbang
388b2(mdo sde): por zhugs par bya zhing g.yo bar 'gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes par bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med//
388b3(mdo sde): snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung
388b4(mdo sde): rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul bdug gnas cig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin te// khams kyi
388b5(mdo sde): sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyi// gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams
388b6(mdo sde): cad 'jig par 'gyur// sa'i sbrul dang chu'i sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me'i sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi
388b7(mdo sde): nam mkhar 'gro ba yin/ ji ltar sngan chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun nas gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji/
388b8(mdo sde): ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skyes// bad kan rlung dang khris pazang gyur na// lus shi ljin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis ni// mngon par mi dga' srin 'bu'i phung
389a1(mdo sde): bor 'gyur// du khrod na 'thor bas rdul shing bzhin 'gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can ji bzhin gang zag
389a2(mdo sde): dang // chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po de dag che 'byung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang
389a3(mdo sde): gi phyir na 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// ma rig pas ni gzhar yang yod min la// ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin ma rig 'di ni yod ma
389a4(mdo sde): yin// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid
389a5(mdo sde): pa dang // skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa dang // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung
389a6(mdo sde): dang mi 'byung ba// tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyi rnam spyod dang // bdag gis lta bar gyur pa spyad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mtsho grol// phung po'i
389a7(mdo sde): gnas la stong par gyur la stong // byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang byed// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun du
389a8(mdo sde): bstan// nga ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug grangs ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag ni mA byas// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi
389b1(mdo sde): mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// ngas ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal// ngas ni tshe kyi rgyal/
389b2(mdo sde): mtshan dam pa sgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi las rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis brdungs gyur
389b3(mdo sde): pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs med gdungs zhe byas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal
389b4(mdo sde): pa du mar sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na// rtul shugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag
389b5(mdo sde): pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig brgyan dang gser// bai dUr+ya dang rin chen sna tshogs dang // stong gsum
389b6(mdo sde): ljon shing thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtsa ba thams cad dang // nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad bcad btubs te// de dag thams cad phyir brlag
389b7(mdo sde): nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil ni ji tsam par// phye me'i phung po spungs nas ni// cha gsum rab tu dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa yi//
389b8(mdo sde): stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems can cig gis gyur// shes pa de'i rdul rnams ni//
390a1(mdo sde): phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyi// thams cad bgrang bar nus
390a2(mdo sde): srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig cig la 'jug pa yang // gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// gser 'od
390a3(mdo sde): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// stong pa nyid kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang // rgyal po chen po yul 'khor
390a4(mdo sde): bsrung dang // rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang // rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas// pus mo g.yas
390a5(mdo sde): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
390a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa/
390a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/
390a8(mdo sde): lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa// sems can lha'i tshogs thams cad mngon par bstod pa// 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi mchod cing sngags te/
390b1(mdo sde): brjod nas rab tu bkur ba// lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar byed pa// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
390b2(mdo sde): gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad rgyun gcod pa// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa// mu ge'i dgon pa thams
390b3(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa// nad kyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel ba mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa// mya ngan dang nyon mongs
390b4(mdo sde): pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
390b5(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher rab tu bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po dpung
390b6(mdo sde): dang bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'dis gzi rdzid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag gi lus brtson pa dang mthu dang stobs rnyed par 'gyur// gzi rdzing
390b7(mdo sde): dang dpal phun sum tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos
390b8(mdo sde): smra ba chos kyi rgyal po lags te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyi lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang dri za
391a1(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi zad pa snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi mdangs
391a2(mdo sde): 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // gnod sbyin stong phrag
391a3(mdo sde): du ma dang lhan cig tu/ rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad lta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab par bgyi
391a4(mdo sde): ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong / zhes bya bar ming du chags so// bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam
391a5(mdo sde): bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ba 'am// mu ge'i gnod pa'am/ nad kyi gnod pa'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa
391a6(mdo sde): stong dang / gnod pa brgya stong phrag gis gces par gyur pa na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
391a7(mdo sde): rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge sbyong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul
391a8(mdo sde): dang byin gyis brlabs kyis chos smra ba de dag bskul ba ni// yul gang dang gang 'chi bar 'gyur// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yul de dag tu rtsa
391b1(mdo sde): cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te// gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom
391b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu// gser 'od dam pa mdo
391b3(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang gnyen par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan
391b4(mdo sde): te/ thos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad la kun du bsrung bar byed/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
391b5(mdo sde): yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas sems can rnams kun du
391b6(mdo sde): bsrung bar bgyi// yongs su sgrub pa dang zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong
391b7(mdo sde): ma'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
391b8(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun
392a1(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin
392a2(mdo sde): pa la sti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid cing mod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po la rgyal po thams cad pas ches sti bstang
392a3(mdo sde): bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu sngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
392a4(mdo sde): po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po legs so// 'di lta ste khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed
392a5(mdo sde): ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po chos kyis lha dang mi'i rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di
392a6(mdo sde): lta ste/ khyod ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde
392a7(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po
392a8(mdo sde): chen po khyed bzhis mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/
392b1(mdo sde): yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod
392b2(mdo sde): sbyin rgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun du 'bar bar 'gyur ro// /
392b3(mdo sde): yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang yog dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis
392b4(mdo sde): lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul bgyid pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams 'pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pa
392b5(mdo sde): rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir// dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag
392b6(mdo sde): kun du bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas
392b7(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs
392b8(mdo sde): te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pi lha nga sa la brtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'angs ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba yongs su btud
393a1(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i

393a3(mdo sde): yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po chen po
393a4(mdo sde): bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gror bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong dang dge slong ma 'am/
393a5(mdo sde): dge snyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti bstang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim 'gro bgyid cing mchod de rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
393a6(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po bzhi g.yog dang bcas par gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i
393a7(mdo sde): lha'i lus 'di dag gzi rjid chen por rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gzi brjid
393a8(mdo sde): dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnams par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// brdzun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi dpung dang / g.yog tu bcas
393b1(mdo sde): pa gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus ltar mi gda' bar bgyi te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor
393b2(mdo sde): ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod por 'gyur ba de dag tu 'chi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa
393b3(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongasu
393b4(mdo sde): bzung ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun du bsrung bar
393b5(mdo sde): bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyi'o// yul de
393b6(mdo sde): dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar zlog par bgyi/ mi'i
393b7(mdo sde): rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal
393b8(mdo sde): po gzhan zhig mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla mang ba nye ba'i de 'di snyam du/ bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag gzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song
393b9(mdo sde): ra pa
394a1(mdo sde): ste/ yul de rnam par gzhag go snyam du sems bskyed na/ brdzun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa
394a2(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ dgra zla mad ba nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan dag g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul
394a3(mdo sde): 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du 'brel pa sna tshogs brgya
394a4(mdo sde): dag kyang 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla mdab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul phyin na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs
394a5(mdo sde): stong 'di lta bu dag 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla mang ba nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
394a6(mdo sde): su 'chi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas 'byung ste// dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der 'chi bar 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam
394a7(mdo sde): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi dpung
394a8(mdo sde): dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma lhan cig tu lus mi ganga' bar gyis te der 'chi bar gyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs yul du zhugs
394b1(mdo sde): pa de las kyang de nyid las zlog par 'gyur ro// 'brel pa sna tshogs brgya dag nye bar bsgrubs par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol
394b2(mdo sde): gyi dmag tshogs de 'chi bar yang mi nus na/ yul ba zhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs se zhes
394b3(mdo sde): bya ba byin nas/ rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs so// khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang
394b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag
394b5(mdo sde): la kun du bsrung bar gyis shig/ yong su bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu sbyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde
394b6(mdo sde): legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun du bsrung cig/ yongasu
394b7(mdo sde): bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jig pa dang /
394b8(mdo sde): gnod pa dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyis shig/ pha rol gyis dmag tshogs rnams kyang rab tu bzlog shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad
395a1(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag thab pa dang / 'chang mi 'bru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen
395a2(mdo sde): po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la
395a3(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal gyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi skyed
395a4(mdo sde): pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyis las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul
395a5(mdo sde): gshig pa'i phyir pha rol gyis mi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems
395a6(mdo sde): dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab 'chang mi 'bru mi brtsod/ mi 'gyed par rang rang yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung
395a7(mdo sde): dang g.yog tu bcas te/ khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang
395a8(mdo sde): mdangs du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang / lo khyud 'khor thams cad kyang yang gang ba'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang / nyi ma dang zla ba dang /
395b1(mdo sde): nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang nor dang 'bru rnams
395b2(mdo sde): 'byor pa 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris
395b3(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la mi'i rgyal por 'gyur la gaster 'od dam
395b4(mdo sde): ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ rim gro byas mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i
395b5(mdo sde): rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti btang du byed/ bla ma byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod
395b6(mdo sde): sbyin stong phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu'i klung chu'i bdud rtsi'i
395b7(mdo sde): khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// khyed kyis brtson
395b8(mdo sde): 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang bskyed do// khyed kyis gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel lo// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs
396a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la yang mchod pa rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs pa byas
396a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma laM yang yo byad bsam gyis
396a3(mdo sde): mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun du bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
396a4(mdo sde): bzung ba dang / yongasu bkyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun
396a5(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// yongasu skyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu sbyang
396a6(mdo sde): ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi
396a7(mdo sde): brjid dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dga'i sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer
396a8(mdo sde): de dag dang yul de dag dang kun du bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bsgrub par 'gyur dgra myed par 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad
396b1(mdo sde): kyis mi rdzi ba dang gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen
396b2(mdo sde): po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal
396b3(mdo sde): po la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun
396b4(mdo sde): mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs 'khor rnams la yang bsrung ba chen po bgying 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i
396b5(mdo sde): pho brang de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa/ bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ tshe
396b6(mdo sde): 'di la bdag gis rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dang ldan par gyur//
396b7(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi lus thams cad kyang kun du bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongs su sbyang 'tshal ba
396b8(mdo sde): gyur/ rang gyi lus la gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis rdzi ba dang / nad mgo ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa
397a1(mdo sde): sh+ya hA/ ma mchis par 'tshal bar gyur te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yengs pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus
397a2(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa dang ri mo dang bcas pa dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sti bstang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa
397a3(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags pa mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i
397a4(mdo sde): pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi phyog der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par
397a5(mdo sde): bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu bda' bgos par mdzes pa bgos nas brgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag
397a6(mdo sde): gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyis te sten de la mchis nas/ rgya lo rgyal bas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyugs la chags par mi bgyi'o// /
397a7(mdo sde): rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra
397a8(mdo sde): ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i 'khor gyi tshogs
397b1(mdo sde): rnams la sdug pa dang / phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnam dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la yang tshig snyan pas smra bar bgyi'o// btsun
397b2(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// chos nyan pa'i chod pa sna tshogs sbyar du stsal bar bgyi/ dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab
397b3(mdo sde): cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde bsams kyi mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag
397b4(mdo sde): nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// dga' ba chen po dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po skyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad
397b5(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gos dkar po sar pa/
397b6(mdo sde): mdzes par bgo bar bgyi'o// sbung pa dang brgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// gdugs dkar po yang bzung bar bgyi/ rgyal po'i mthu
397b7(mdo sde): chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ nga rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung la chos smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// /
397b8(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal po des gom pa ji snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir rnyil bar 'gyur/ de rnyed kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i
398a1(mdo sde): rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen por bsam/
398a2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba'i lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag
398a3(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi lha'i rgyal rigs lha brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur
398a4(mdo sde): yun ring du mtsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig bzung ba 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin du rgyas par 'gyur//
398a5(mdo sde): sngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur/
398a6(mdo sde): stobs che bar 'gyur/ chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang lta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang
398a7(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phrad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa/
398a8(mdo sde): yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu
398b1(mdo sde): bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya 'am dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa/
398b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de dag bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
398b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakya thub pa de dag bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshes gsol bar 'gyur/ deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco//
398b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bgyi'o// deng bdag chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par
398b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag
398b6(mdo sde): gis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya chen po byas par
398b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rjes 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// deng bdag
398b8(mdo sde): gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin gyi
399a1(mdo sde): lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor lo bsgyur
399a2(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// dang bdag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
399a3(mdo sde): stong phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gi bsod rnams kyi phung po yangs shing rgya che ba dpag tu med pa bsam gyi mi khyab
399a4(mdo sde): pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gi btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyi tshogs la bsrung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi
399a5(mdo sde): ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis lus 'di thams
399a6(mdo sde): cad kun du bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su sbyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba med
399a7(mdo sde): pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gser
399a8(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa 'di lta bus sti bstang byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par
399b1(mdo sde): byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal
399b2(mdo sde): po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du ba dag dang / tshe 'di la lus kyi rgyal srid dbang phyag chen po bsam gyis mi khyab des rnams pa/
399b3(mdo sde): 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid
399b4(mdo sde): kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang dgra thams cad dang chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' rtsal pa dang /
399b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus/
399b6(mdo sde): pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa
399b7(mdo sde): de la yang sti btang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid mchod par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag gis slad du/ rgyal po'i pho brang de shin du dag par phyag bdar bgyid// spos
399b8(mdo sde): chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab nas/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa der bdag nyan cing bdag dang lha
400a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shas cung zad sbyin par byed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi
400a2(mdo sde): stan la mchis ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po des/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs 'dug par bya'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser
400a3(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri
400a4(mdo sde): shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag skad cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs
400a5(mdo sde): kyi khri shing dag gis gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri chen po yang snum par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba
400a6(mdo sde): des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/
